232  &Spell::EffectActivateSpec, //162 SPELL_EFFECT_TALENT_SPEC_SELECT activate primary/secondary spec
233  &Spell::EffectNULL, //163 unused
234  &Spell::EffectRemoveAura, //164 SPELL_EFFECT_REMOVE_AURA
235 };
236 
237 void Spell::EffectNULL(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
238 {
239  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "WORLD: Spell Effect DUMMY");
240 }
241 
242 void Spell::EffectUnused(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
243 {
244  // NOT USED BY ANY SPELL OR USELESS OR IMPLEMENTED IN DIFFERENT WAY IN TRINITY
245 }
246 
247 void Spell::EffectResurrectNew(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
248 {
249  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
250  return;
251 
252  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsAlive())
253  return;
254 
255  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
256  return;
257 
258  if (!unitTarget->IsInWorld())
259  return;
260 
261  Player* target = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
262 
263  if (target->isResurrectRequested()) // already have one active request
264  return;
265 
266  uint32 health = damage;
267  uint32 mana = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
268  ExecuteLogEffectResurrect(effIndex, target);
269  target->setResurrectRequestData(m_caster->GetGUID(), m_caster->GetMapId(), m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ(), health, mana);
270  SendResurrectRequest(target);
271 }
272 
273 void Spell::EffectInstaKill(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
274 {
275  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
276  return;
277 
278  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || unitTarget->HasAura(27827)) // Spirit of redemption doesn't make you death, but can cause infinite loops
279  return;
280 
281  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
282  if (unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetCommandStatus(CHEAT_GOD))
283  return;
284 
285  if (m_caster == unitTarget) // prevent interrupt message
286  finish();
287 
288  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SPELLINSTAKILLLOG, 8 + 8 + 4);
289  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
290  data << unitTarget->GetGUID();
291  data << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id);
292  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&data, true);
293 
294  Unit::DealDamage(m_caster, unitTarget, unitTarget->GetHealth(), nullptr, NODAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
295 }
296 
297 void Spell::EffectEnvironmentalDMG(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
298 {
299  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
300  return;
301 
302  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
303  return;
304 
305  if (unitTarget->IsPlayer())
306  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->EnvironmentalDamage(DAMAGE_FIRE, damage);
307  else
308  {
309  DamageInfo dmgInfo(m_caster, unitTarget, damage, m_spellInfo, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
310 
311  uint32 absorb = dmgInfo.GetAbsorb();
312  uint32 resist = dmgInfo.GetResist();
313  uint32 envDamage = dmgInfo.GetDamage();
314 
315  Unit::DealDamageMods(unitTarget, envDamage, &absorb);
316  damage = envDamage;
317 
318  m_caster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, damage, m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), absorb, resist, false, 0, false);
319  }
320 }
321 
322 void Spell::EffectSchoolDMG(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
323 {
324  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
325  return;
326 
327  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive())
328  {
329  bool apply_direct_bonus = true;
330  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
331  {
332  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
333  {
334  // Meteor like spells (divided damage to targets)
335  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_SHARE_DAMAGE))
336  {
337  uint32 count = 0;
338  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
339  if (ihit->effectMask & (1 << effIndex))
340  ++count;
341 
342  damage /= count; // divide to all targets
343  }
344 
345  switch (m_spellInfo->Id) // better way to check unknown
346  {
347  // Consumption
348  case 28865:
349  damage = (m_caster->GetMap()->ToInstanceMap()->GetDifficulty() == REGULAR_DIFFICULTY ? 2750 : 4250);
350  break;
351  // percent from health with min
352  case 25599: // Thundercrash
353  {
354  damage = unitTarget->GetHealth() / 2;
355  if (damage < 200)
356  damage = 200;
357  break;
358  }
359  // arcane charge. must only affect demons (also undead?)
360  case 45072:
361  {
362  if (unitTarget->GetCreatureType() != CREATURE_TYPE_DEMON
363  && unitTarget->GetCreatureType() != CREATURE_TYPE_UNDEAD)
364  return;
365  break;
366  }
367  // Gargoyle Strike
368  case 51963:
369  {
370  // about +4 base spell dmg per level
371  damage = (m_caster->getLevel() - 60) * 4 + 60;
372  break;
373  }
374  }
375  break;
376  }
377  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
378  {
379  // Shield Slam
380  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x200 && m_spellInfo->GetCategory() == 1209)
381  {
382  uint8 level = m_caster->getLevel();
383  // xinef: shield block should increase the limit
384  float limit = m_caster->HasAura(2565) ? 2.0f : 1.0f;
385  uint32 block_value = m_caster->GetShieldBlockValue(uint32(float(level) * 24.5f * limit), uint32(float(level) * 34.5f * limit));
386 
387  damage += int32(m_caster->ApplyEffectModifiers(m_spellInfo, effIndex, float(block_value)));
388  }
389  // Victory Rush
390  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x100)
391  ApplyPct(damage, m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK));
392  // Shockwave
393  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 46968)
394  {
395  int32 pct = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, 2);
396  if (pct > 0)
397  damage += int32(CalculatePct(m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK), pct));
398  break;
399  }
400  break;
401  }
402  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
403  {
404  // Incinerate Rank 1 & 2
405  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x000040) && m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 2128)
406  {
407  // Incinerate does more dmg (dmg*0.25) if the target have Immolate debuff.
408  // Check aura state for speed but aura state set not only for Immolate spell
409  if (unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE))
410  {
411  if (unitTarget->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, 0x4, 0, 0))
412  damage += damage / 4;
413  }
414  }
415  // Immolate - hidden delay for conflagrate
416  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x4)
417  {
418  }
419  // Conflagrate - consumes Immolate or Shadowflame
420  else if (m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState == AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE)
421  {
422  AuraEffect const* aura = nullptr; // found req. aura for damage calculation
423 
424  Unit::AuraEffectList const& mPeriodic = unitTarget->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
425  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = mPeriodic.begin(); i != mPeriodic.end(); ++i)
426  {
427  // for caster applied auras only
428  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK ||
429  (*i)->GetCasterGUID() != m_caster->GetGUID())
430  continue;
431 
432  // Immolate
433  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x4)
434  {
435  aura = *i; // it selected always if exist
436  break;
437  }
438 
439  // Shadowflame
440  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[2] & 0x00000002)
441  aura = *i; // remember but wait possible Immolate as primary priority
442  }
443 
444  // found Immolate or Shadowflame
445  if (aura)
446  {
447  uint32 pdamage = uint32(std::max(aura->GetAmount(), 0));
448  pdamage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_caster, aura->GetSpellInfo(), pdamage, DOT, aura->GetBase()->GetStackAmount());
449  uint32 pct_dir = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, (effIndex + 1));
450  uint8 baseTotalTicks = uint8(m_caster->CalcSpellDuration(aura->GetSpellInfo()) / aura->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_0].Amplitude);
451 
452  damage += int32(CalculatePct(pdamage * baseTotalTicks, pct_dir));
453 
454  uint32 pct_dot = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, (effIndex + 2)) / 3;
455  m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[1] = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcBaseValue(int32(CalculatePct(pdamage * baseTotalTicks, pct_dot)));
456 
457  apply_direct_bonus = false;
458  // Glyph of Conflagrate
459  if (!m_caster->HasAura(56235))
460  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(aura->GetId(), m_caster->GetGUID());
461 
462  break;
463  }
464  }
465  // Shadow Bite
466  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x400000)
467  {
468  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && m_caster->IsPet())
469  {
470  if (Player* owner = m_caster->GetOwner()->ToPlayer())
471  {
472  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = owner->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_ADD_FLAT_MODIFIER, SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, 214, 0))
473  {
474  int32 bp0 = aurEff->GetId() == 54037 ? 4 : 8;
475  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 54425, &bp0, nullptr, nullptr, true);
476  }
477  }
478  }
479  }
480  break;
481  }
482  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
483  {
484  // Improved Mind Blast (Mind Blast in shadow form bonus)
485  if (m_caster->GetShapeshiftForm() == FORM_SHADOW && (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00002000))
486  {
487  Unit::AuraEffectList const& ImprMindBlast = m_caster->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_ADD_FLAT_MODIFIER);
488  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = ImprMindBlast.begin(); i != ImprMindBlast.end(); ++i)
489  {
490  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST &&
491  ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 95))
492  {
493  int chance = (*i)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue(m_caster);
494  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
495  // Mind Trauma
496  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 48301, true, 0);
497  break;
498  }
499  }
500  }
501  break;
502  }
503  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
504  {
505  // Ferocious Bite
506  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x000800000) && m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 6587)
507  {
508  // converts each extra point of energy into ($f1+$AP/410) additional damage
509  float ap = m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
510  float multiple = ap / 410 + m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].DamageMultiplier;
511  int32 energy = -(m_caster->ModifyPower(POWER_ENERGY, -30));
512  damage += int32(energy * multiple);
513  damage += int32(CalculatePct(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetComboPoints() * ap, 7));
514  }
515  // Wrath
516  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00000001)
517  {
518  // Improved Insect Swarm
519  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = m_caster->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 1771, 0))
520  if (unitTarget->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 0x00200000, 0, 0))
521  AddPct(damage, aurEff->GetAmount());
522  }
523  break;
524  }
525  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
526  {
527  // Envenom
528  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x00000008)
529  {
530  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
531  {
532  // consume from stack dozes not more that have combo-points
533  if (uint32 combo = player->GetComboPoints())
534  {
535  // Lookup for Deadly poison (only attacker applied)
536  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = unitTarget->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE, SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE, 0x00010000, 0, 0, m_caster->GetGUID()))
537  {
538  // count consumed deadly poison doses at target
539  bool needConsume = true;
540  uint32 spellId = aurEff->GetId();
541 
542  uint32 doses = aurEff->GetBase()->GetStackAmount();
543  if (doses > combo)
544  doses = combo;
545 
546  // Master Poisoner
547  Unit::AuraEffectList const& auraList = player->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_AURA_DURATION_BY_DISPEL_NOT_STACK);
548  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator iter = auraList.begin(); iter != auraList.end(); ++iter)
549  {
550  if ((*iter)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE && (*iter)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 1960)
551  {
552  uint32 chance = (*iter)->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcValue(m_caster);
553 
554  if (chance && roll_chance_i(chance))
555  needConsume = false;
556 
557  break;
558  }
559  }
560 
561  if (needConsume)
562  for (uint32 i = 0; i < doses; ++i)
563  unitTarget->RemoveAuraFromStack(spellId, m_caster->GetGUID());
564 
565  damage *= doses;
566  damage += int32(player->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * 0.09f * combo);
567  }
568 
569  // Eviscerate and Envenom Bonus Damage (item set effect)
570  if (m_caster->HasAura(37169))
571  damage += combo * 40;
572  }
573  }
574  }
575  // Eviscerate
576  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00020000)
577  {
578  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
579  {
580  if (uint32 combo = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetComboPoints())
581  {
582  float ap = m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
583  damage += int32(ap * combo * 0.07f);
584 
585  // Eviscerate and Envenom Bonus Damage (item set effect)
586  if (m_caster->HasAura(37169))
587  damage += combo * 40;
588  }
589  }
590  }
591  break;
592  }
593  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
594  {
595  //Gore
596  if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 1578)
597  {
598  if (m_caster->HasAura(57627)) // Charge 6 sec post-affect
599  damage *= 2;
600  }
601  // Steady Shot
602  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x1)
603  {
604  bool found = false;
605  // check dazed affect
606  Unit::AuraEffectList const& decSpeedList = unitTarget->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
607  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator iter = decSpeedList.begin(); iter != decSpeedList.end(); ++iter)
608  {
609  if ((*iter)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellIconID == 15 && (*iter)->GetSpellInfo()->Dispel == 0)
610  {
611  found = true;
612  break;
613  }
614  }
615 
616  // TODO: should this be put on taken but not done?
617  if (found)
618  damage += m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue();
619 
620  if (Player* caster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
621  {
622  // Add Ammo and Weapon damage plus RAP * 0.1
623  if (Item* item = caster->GetWeaponForAttack(RANGED_ATTACK))
624  {
625  ItemTemplate const* weaponTemplate = item->GetTemplate();
626  float dmg_min = weaponTemplate->Damage[0].DamageMin;
627  float dmg_max = weaponTemplate->Damage[0].DamageMax;
628  if (dmg_max == 0.0f && dmg_min > dmg_max)
629  damage += int32(dmg_min);
630  else
631  damage += irand(int32(dmg_min), int32(dmg_max));
632  damage += int32(caster->GetAmmoDPS() * weaponTemplate->Delay * 0.001f);
633  }
634  }
635  }
636  break;
637  }
638  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
639  {
640  // Hammer of the Righteous
641  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x00040000)
642  {
643  // Add main hand dps * effect[2] amount
644  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
645  {
646  float mindamage, maxdamage;
647  player->CalculateMinMaxDamage(BASE_ATTACK, false, false, mindamage, maxdamage);
648  float average = (mindamage + maxdamage) / 2;
649  int32 count = m_caster->CalculateSpellDamage(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, EFFECT_2);
650  damage += count * int32(average * IN_MILLISECONDS) / m_caster->GetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK);
651  }
652  break;
653  }
654  // Shield of Righteousness
655  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[EFFECT_1] & 0x100000)
656  {
657  uint8 level = m_caster->getLevel();
658  uint32 block_value = m_caster->GetShieldBlockValue(uint32(float(level) * 29.5f), uint32(float(level) * 34.5f));
659  if (m_caster->GetAuraEffect(64882, EFFECT_0))
660  block_value += 225;
661  damage += CalculatePct(block_value, m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue());
662  break;
663  }
664  break;
665  }
666  }
667 
668  if (m_originalCaster /*&& damage > 0 Xinef: this can be increased from 0*/ && apply_direct_bonus)
669  {
670  // Xinef: protection
671  if (damage < 0)
672  damage = 0;
673 
674  damage = m_originalCaster->SpellDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, (uint32)damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
675  damage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo, (uint32)damage, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
676  }
677 
678  m_damage += damage;
679  }
680 }
681 
682 void Spell::EffectDummy(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
683 {
684  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
685  return;
686 
687  if (!unitTarget && !gameObjTarget && !itemTarget)
688  return;
689 
690  // selection by spell family
691  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
692  {
693  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
694  {
695  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
696  {
697  // Trial of the Champion, Trample
698  case 67866:
699  {
700  if( unitTarget && !unitTarget->IsVehicle() && !unitTarget->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_MOUNTDISPLAYID) )
701  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 67867, false);
702  return;
703  }
704  // Trial of the Champion, Hammer of the Righteous
705  case 66867:
706  {
707  if( !unitTarget )
708  return;
709  if( unitTarget->HasAura(66940) )
710  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 66903, true);
711  else
712  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 66904, true);
713  return;
714  }
715  case 17731:
716  case 69294:
717  {
718  if( !gameObjTarget || gameObjTarget->GetRespawnTime() > time(nullptr) )
719  return;
720 
721  gameObjTarget->SetRespawnTime(10);
722  gameObjTarget->SendCustomAnim(gameObjTarget->GetGoAnimProgress());
723  if( Creature* trigger = gameObjTarget->SummonCreature(12758, *gameObjTarget, TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN, 1000) )
724  trigger->CastSpell(trigger, 17731, false);
725 
726  return;
727  }
728  // HoL, Arc Weld
729  case 59086:
730  {
731  if( m_caster && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->ToPlayer()->isMoving() )
732  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 59097, true);
733 
734  return;
735  }
736  }
737  break;
738  }
739  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
740  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
741  {
742  case 31789: // Righteous Defense (step 1)
743  {
744  if (!unitTarget)
745  return;
746  // not empty (checked), copy
747  Unit::AttackerSet attackers = unitTarget->getAttackers();
748 
749  // remove invalid attackers
750  for (Unit::AttackerSet::iterator aItr = attackers.begin(); aItr != attackers.end();)
751  if (!(*aItr)->IsValidAttackTarget(m_caster))
752  aItr = attackers.erase(aItr);
753  else
754  ++aItr;
755 
756  // selected from list 3
757  uint32 maxTargets = std::min<uint32>(3, attackers.size());
758  for (uint32 i = 0; i < maxTargets; ++i)
759  {
760  Unit::AttackerSet::iterator aItr = attackers.begin();
761  std::advance(aItr, urand(0, attackers.size() - 1));
762  m_caster->CastSpell((*aItr), 31790, true);
763  attackers.erase(aItr);
764  }
765 
766  return;
767  }
768  }
769  break;
770  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
771  // Hunger for Blood
772  if( m_spellInfo->Id == 51662 )
773  {
774  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 63848, true);
775  return;
776  }
777  break;
778  }
779 
780  // pet auras
781  if (PetAura const* petSpell = sSpellMgr->GetPetAura(m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex))
782  {
783  m_caster->AddPetAura(petSpell);
784  return;
785  }
786 
787  // normal DB scripted effect
788  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell ScriptStart spellid %u in EffectDummy(%u)", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
789  m_caster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(sSpellScripts, uint32(m_spellInfo->Id | (effIndex << 24)), m_caster, unitTarget);
790 #ifdef ELUNA
791  if (gameObjTarget)
792  sEluna->OnDummyEffect(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex, gameObjTarget);
793  else if (unitTarget && unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
794  sEluna->OnDummyEffect(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex, unitTarget->ToCreature());
795  else if (itemTarget)
796  sEluna->OnDummyEffect(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex, itemTarget);
797 #endif
798 }
799 
800 void Spell::EffectTriggerSpell(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
801 {
802  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET
803  && effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH)
804  return;
805 
806  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
807 
808  // todo: move those to spell scripts
809  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_TRIGGER_SPELL
810  && effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
811  {
812  // special cases
813  switch (triggered_spell_id)
814  {
815  // Mirror Image
816  case 58832:
817  {
818  // Glyph of Mirror Image
819  if (m_caster->HasAura(63093))
820  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 65047, true); // Mirror Image
821 
822  break;
823  }
824  // Vanish (not exist)
825  case 18461:
826  {
827  unitTarget->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(true);
828  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED);
829 
830  // See if we already are stealthed. If so, we're done.
831  if (unitTarget->HasAura(1784))
832  return;
833 
834  // Reset cooldown on stealth if needed
835  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && unitTarget->ToPlayer()->HasSpellCooldown(1784))
836  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->RemoveSpellCooldown(1784);
837 
838  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 1784, true);
839  return;
840  }
841  // Demonic Empowerment -- succubus
842  case 54437:
843  {
844  unitTarget->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(true);
845  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED);
846  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN);
847 
848  // Cast Lesser Invisibility
849  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 7870, true);
850  return;
851  }
852  // just skip
853  case 23770: // Sayge's Dark Fortune of *
854  // not exist, common cooldown can be implemented in scripts if need.
855  return;
856  // Brittle Armor - (need add max stack of 24575 Brittle Armor)
857  case 29284:
858  {
859  // Brittle Armor
860  SpellInfo const* spell = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(24575);
861  if (!spell)
862  return;
863 
864  for (uint32 j = 0; j < spell->StackAmount; ++j)
865  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell->Id, true);
866  return;
867  }
868  // Mercurial Shield - (need add max stack of 26464 Mercurial Shield)
869  case 29286:
870  {
871  // Mercurial Shield
872  SpellInfo const* spell = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(26464);
873  if (!spell)
874  return;
875 
876  for (uint32 j = 0; j < spell->StackAmount; ++j)
877  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell->Id, true);
878  return;
879  }
880  // Cloak of Shadows
881  case 35729:
882  {
883  uint32 dispelMask = SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DISPEL_ALL);
884  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& Auras = unitTarget->GetAppliedAuras();
885  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator iter = Auras.begin(); iter != Auras.end();)
886  {
887  // remove all harmful spells on you...
888  SpellInfo const* spell = iter->second->GetBase()->GetSpellInfo();
889 
890  // Pounce Bleed shouldn't be removed by Cloak of Shadows.
891  if (spell->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & 1 << MECHANIC_BLEED)
892  return;
893 
894  bool dmgClassNone = false;
895  if (spell->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE && spell->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC)
896  for (uint8 i = EFFECT_0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
897  {
898  if ((iter->second->GetEffectMask() & (1 << i)) &&
899  spell->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName != SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE &&
900  spell->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName != SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL &&
901  spell->Effects[i].ApplyAuraName != SPELL_AURA_DUMMY)
902  {
903  dmgClassNone = false;
904  break;
905  }
906  dmgClassNone = true;
907  }
908 
909  if ((spell->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC || (spell->GetDispelMask() & dispelMask) || dmgClassNone) &&
910  // ignore positive and passive auras
911  !iter->second->IsPositive() && !iter->second->GetBase()->IsPassive() &&
912  // Xinef: Ignore NPC spells having INVULNERABILITY attribute
913  (!spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_NO_IMMUNITIES) || spell->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC))
914  {
915  m_caster->RemoveAura(iter);
916  }
917  else
918  ++iter;
919  }
920  return;
921  }
922  // Spell Lock, handled in interrupt effect
923  // launch is handled before hit triggers, thus silence removes current casted spell
924  // and interrupt is unable to detect any cast and doesnt work
925  case 24259:
926  return;
927  }
928  }
929 
930  // normal case
931  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggered_spell_id);
932  if (!spellInfo)
933  {
934  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::EffectTriggerSpell spell %u tried to trigger unknown spell %u", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
935  return;
936  }
937 
938  SpellCastTargets targets;
939  if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
940  {
941  if (!spellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
942  return;
943  targets.SetUnitTarget(unitTarget);
944  }
945  else //if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH)
946  {
947  if (spellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetProvidedTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK))
948  return;
949 
950  if (spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
951  targets.SetDst(m_targets);
952 
953  if (Unit* target = m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
954  targets.SetUnitTarget(target);
955  else
956  targets.SetUnitTarget(m_caster);
957  }
958 
959  CustomSpellValues values;
960  // set basepoints for trigger with value effect
961  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE)
962  {
963  // maybe need to set value only when basepoints == 0?
964  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, damage);
965  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, damage);
966  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, damage);
967  }
968 
969  // Remove spell cooldown (not category) if spell triggering spell with cooldown and same category
970  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime && m_spellInfo->GetCategory() == spellInfo->GetCategory())
971  {
972  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id);
973  }
974 
975  // original caster guid only for GO cast
976  m_caster->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, &values, TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK & ~TRIGGERED_NO_PERIODIC_RESET), nullptr, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID);
977 }
978 
979 void Spell::EffectTriggerMissileSpell(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
980 {
981  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET
982  && effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
983  return;
984 
985  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
986 
987  // normal case
988  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggered_spell_id);
989  if (!spellInfo)
990  {
991  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::EffectTriggerMissileSpell spell %u tried to trigger unknown spell %u", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
992  return;
993  }
994 
995  SpellCastTargets targets;
996  if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
997  {
998  if (!spellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, effIndex))
999  return;
1000  targets.SetUnitTarget(unitTarget);
1001  }
1002  else //if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
1003  {
1004  if (spellInfo->NeedsToBeTriggeredByCaster(m_spellInfo, effIndex) && (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetProvidedTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK))
1005  return;
1006 
1007  if (spellInfo->GetExplicitTargetMask() & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1008  targets.SetDst(m_targets);
1009 
1010  targets.SetUnitTarget(m_caster);
1011  }
1012 
1013  CustomSpellValues values;
1014  // set basepoints for trigger with value effect
1015  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_TRIGGER_MISSILE_SPELL_WITH_VALUE)
1016  {
1017  // maybe need to set value only when basepoints == 0?
1018  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, damage);
1019  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, damage);
1020  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, damage);
1021  }
1022 
1023  // Remove spell cooldown (not category) if spell triggering spell with cooldown and same category
1024  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && spellInfo->CategoryRecoveryTime && m_spellInfo->GetCategory() == spellInfo->GetCategory())
1025  {
1026  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveSpellCooldown(spellInfo->Id);
1027  }
1028 
1029  // original caster guid only for GO cast
1030  m_caster->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, &values, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK, nullptr, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID);
1031 }
1032 
1033 void Spell::EffectForceCast(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1034 {
1035  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1036  return;
1037 
1038  if (!unitTarget)
1039  return;
1040 
1041  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
1042 
1043  // normal case
1044  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggered_spell_id);
1045 
1046  if (!spellInfo)
1047  {
1048  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectForceCast of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
1049  return;
1050  }
1051 
1052  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_FORCE_CAST && damage)
1053  {
1054  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
1055  {
1056  case 52588: // Skeletal Gryphon Escape
1057  case 48598: // Ride Flamebringer Cue
1058  unitTarget->RemoveAura(damage);
1059  break;
1060  case 52463: // Hide In Mine Car
1061  case 52349: // Overtake
1062  unitTarget->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, spellInfo->Id, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, true, nullptr, nullptr, m_originalCasterGUID);
1063  return;
1064  case 72378: // Blood Nova
1065  case 73058: // Blood Nova
1066  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, damage, true); // additional spell cast
1067  break;
1068  }
1069  }
1070 
1071  CustomSpellValues values;
1072  // set basepoints for trigger with value effect
1073  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_FORCE_CAST_WITH_VALUE)
1074  {
1075  // maybe need to set value only when basepoints == 0?
1076  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, damage);
1077  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT1, damage);
1078  values.AddSpellMod(SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT2, damage);
1079  }
1080 
1081  SpellCastTargets targets;
1082  targets.SetUnitTarget(m_caster);
1083 
1084  unitTarget->CastSpell(targets, spellInfo, &values, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK);
1085 }
1086 
1087 void Spell::EffectTriggerRitualOfSummoning(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1088 {
1089  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
1090  return;
1091 
1092  uint32 triggered_spell_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
1093  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(triggered_spell_id);
1094 
1095  if (!spellInfo)
1096  {
1097  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "EffectTriggerRitualOfSummoning of spell %u: triggering unknown spell id %i", m_spellInfo->Id, triggered_spell_id);
1098  return;
1099  }
1100 
1101  finish();
1102 
1103  m_caster->CastSpell((Unit*)nullptr, spellInfo, false);
1104 }
1105 
1106 void Spell::EffectJump(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1107 {
1108  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
1109  return;
1110 
1111  if (m_caster->IsInFlight())
1112  return;
1113 
1114  if (!unitTarget)
1115  return;
1116 
1117  float speedXY, speedZ;
1118  CalculateJumpSpeeds(effIndex, m_caster->GetExactDist2d(unitTarget), speedXY, speedZ);
1119  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(*unitTarget, speedXY, speedZ);
1120 
1121  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1122  {
1123  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
1124  }
1125 }
1126 
1127 void Spell::EffectJumpDest(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1128 {
1129  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH)
1130  return;
1131 
1132  if (m_caster->IsInFlight())
1133  return;
1134 
1135  if (!m_targets.HasDst() || m_caster->GetVehicle())
1136  return;
1137 
1138  // Init dest coordinates
1139  float x, y, z;
1140  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
1141  // xinef: this can happen if MovePositionToFirstCollision detects that X, Y cords are invalid and returns prematurely
1142  if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(x, y, z) || z <= INVALID_HEIGHT)
1143  return;
1144 
1145  float speedXY, speedZ;
1146  float dist = m_caster->GetExactDist2d(x, y);
1147  CalculateJumpSpeeds(effIndex, dist, speedXY, speedZ);
1148 
1149  // Override, calculations are incorrect
1150  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 49376) // feral charge
1151  {
1152  speedXY = pow(speedZ * 10, 8);
1153  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(x, y, z, speedXY, speedZ, 0, ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_caster, m_caster->GetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_TARGET)));
1154 
1155  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1156  {
1157  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
1158  }
1159 
1160  return;
1161  }
1162 
1163  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 57604) // death grip
1164  {
1165  speedZ = 3.0f;
1166  speedXY = 50.0f;
1167  }
1168 
1169  // crash fix?
1170  if (speedXY < 1.0f)
1171  speedXY = 1.0f;
1172 
1173  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(x, y, z, speedXY, speedZ);
1174 
1175  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1176  {
1177  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
1178  }
1179 }
1180 
1181 void Spell::CalculateJumpSpeeds(uint8 i, float dist, float& speedXY, float& speedZ)
1182 {
1183  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue)
1184  speedZ = float(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue) / 10;
1185  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValueB)
1186  speedZ = float(m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValueB) / 10;
1187  else
1188  speedZ = 10.0f;
1189  speedXY = dist * 10.0f / speedZ;
1190 }
1191 
1192 void Spell::EffectTeleportUnits(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1193 {
1194  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1195  return;
1196 
1197  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsInFlight())
1198  return;
1199 
1200  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1201  {
1202  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(unitTarget->ToPlayer());
1203  }
1204 
1205  // Pre effects
1206  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
1207  {
1208  case 70746: // Teleport Into Sunwell (for Battered Hilt)
1209  if (Player* target = unitTarget->ToPlayer())
1210  {
1211  uint32 mapid = destTarget->GetMapId();
1212  float x, y, z, orientation;
1213  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z, orientation);
1214  target->TeleportTo(mapid, x, y, z, orientation, TELE_TO_GM_MODE); // skip PlayerCannotEnter check
1215  }
1216  return;
1217  }
1218 
1219  // If not exist data for dest location - return
1220  if (!m_targets.HasDst())
1221  {
1222  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectTeleportUnits - does not have destination for spell ID %u\n", m_spellInfo->Id);
1223  return;
1224  }
1225 
1226  // Init dest coordinates
1227  uint32 mapid = destTarget->GetMapId();
1228  if (mapid == MAPID_INVALID)
1229  mapid = unitTarget->GetMapId();
1230  float x, y, z, orientation;
1231  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z, orientation);
1232  if (!orientation && m_targets.GetUnitTarget())
1233  orientation = m_targets.GetUnitTarget()->GetOrientation();
1234  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell::EffectTeleportUnits - teleport unit to %u %f %f %f %f\n", mapid, x, y, z, orientation);
1235 
1236  if (mapid == unitTarget->GetMapId())
1237  {
1238  if (unitTarget->GetVehicleKit()) // we are vehicle!
1239  unitTarget->GetVehicleKit()->TeleportVehicle(x, y, z, orientation);
1240  else
1241  {
1242  bool withPet = unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC && unitTarget->GetMap()->IsDungeon() && unitTarget->GetExactDist(x, y, z) > 50.0f;
1243  unitTarget->NearTeleportTo(x, y, z, orientation, unitTarget == m_caster, false, withPet, true);
1244  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // pussywizard: for units it's done inside NearTeleportTo
1245  unitTarget->UpdateObjectVisibility(true);
1246  }
1247  }
1248  else if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1249  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->TeleportTo(mapid, x, y, z, orientation, unitTarget == m_caster ? TELE_TO_SPELL : 0);
1250  else
1251  {
1252  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectTeleportUnits - spellId %u attempted to teleport creature to a different map.", m_spellInfo->Id);
1253  return;
1254  }
1255 
1256  // post effects for TARGET_DEST_DB
1257  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
1258  {
1259  // Dimensional Ripper - Everlook
1260  case 23442:
1261  {
1262  int32 r = irand(0, 119);
1263  if (r >= 70) // 7/12 success
1264  {
1265  if (r < 100) // 4/12 evil twin
1266  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23445, true);
1267  else // 1/12 fire
1268  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23449, true);
1269  }
1270  return;
1271  }
1272  // Ultrasafe Transporter: Toshley's Station
1273  case 36941:
1274  {
1275  if (roll_chance_i(50)) // 50% success
1276  {
1277  int32 rand_eff = urand(1, 7);
1278  switch (rand_eff)
1279  {
1280  case 1:
1281  // soul split - evil
1282  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36900, true);
1283  break;
1284  case 2:
1285  // soul split - good
1286  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36901, true);
1287  break;
1288  case 3:
1289  // Increase the size
1290  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36895, true);
1291  break;
1292  case 4:
1293  // Decrease the size
1294  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36893, true);
1295  break;
1296  case 5:
1297  // Transform
1298  {
1299  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE)
1300  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36897, true);
1301  else
1302  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36899, true);
1303  break;
1304  }
1305  case 6:
1306  // chicken
1307  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36940, true);
1308  break;
1309  case 7:
1310  // evil twin
1311  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23445, true);
1312  break;
1313  }
1314  }
1315  return;
1316  }
1317  // Dimensional Ripper - Area 52
1318  case 36890:
1319  {
1320  if (roll_chance_i(50)) // 50% success
1321  {
1322  int32 rand_eff = urand(1, 4);
1323  switch (rand_eff)
1324  {
1325  case 1:
1326  // soul split - evil
1327  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36900, true);
1328  break;
1329  case 2:
1330  // soul split - good
1331  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36901, true);
1332  break;
1333  case 3:
1334  // Increase the size
1335  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36895, true);
1336  break;
1337  case 4:
1338  // Transform
1339  {
1340  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE)
1341  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36897, true);
1342  else
1343  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 36899, true);
1344  break;
1345  }
1346  }
1347  }
1348  return;
1349  }
1350  }
1351 }
1352 
1353 void Spell::EffectApplyAura(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1354 {
1355  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1356  return;
1357 
1358  if (!m_spellAura || !unitTarget)
1359  return;
1360  ASSERT(unitTarget == m_spellAura->GetOwner());
1361  m_spellAura->_ApplyEffectForTargets(effIndex);
1362 }
1363 
1364 void Spell::EffectApplyAreaAura(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1365 {
1366  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1367  return;
1368 
1369  if (!m_spellAura || !unitTarget)
1370  return;
1371  ASSERT (unitTarget == m_spellAura->GetOwner());
1372  m_spellAura->_ApplyEffectForTargets(effIndex);
1373 }
1374 
1375 void Spell::EffectUnlearnSpecialization(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1376 {
1377  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1378  return;
1379 
1380  if (!unitTarget)
1381  return;
1382 
1383  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
1384  if (!player)
1385  {
1386  return;
1387  }
1388 
1389  uint32 spellToUnlearn = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
1390 
1391  player->removeSpell(spellToUnlearn, SPEC_MASK_ALL, false);
1392  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell: Player %s has unlearned spell %u from Npc: %s",
1393  player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), spellToUnlearn, m_caster->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1394 }
1395 
1396 void Spell::EffectPowerDrain(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1397 {
1398  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1399  return;
1400 
1401  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
1402  return;
1403 
1404  Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
1405 
1406  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || unitTarget->getPowerType() != PowerType || damage < 0)
1407  return;
1408 
1409  // add spell damage bonus
1410  damage = m_caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1411  damage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1412 
1413  // resilience reduce mana draining effect at spell crit damage reduction (added in 2.4)
1414  int32 power = damage;
1415  if (PowerType == POWER_MANA)
1416  power -= unitTarget->GetSpellCritDamageReduction(power);
1417 
1418  int32 newDamage = -(unitTarget->ModifyPower(PowerType, -int32(power)));
1419 
1420  float gainMultiplier = 0.0f;
1421 
1422  // Don`t restore from self drain
1423  if (m_caster != unitTarget)
1424  {
1425  gainMultiplier = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValueMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
1426 
1427  int32 gain = int32(newDamage * gainMultiplier);
1428 
1429  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, gain, PowerType);
1430  }
1431  ExecuteLogEffectTakeTargetPower(effIndex, unitTarget, PowerType, newDamage, gainMultiplier);
1432 }
1433 
1434 void Spell::EffectSendEvent(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1435 {
1436  // we do not handle a flag dropping or clicking on flag in battleground by sendevent system
1437  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET
1438  && effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
1439  return;
1440 
1441  WorldObject* target = nullptr;
1442 
1443  // call events for object target if present
1444  if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1445  {
1446  if (unitTarget)
1447  target = unitTarget;
1448  else if (gameObjTarget)
1449  target = gameObjTarget;
1450  }
1451  else // if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
1452  {
1453  // let's prevent executing effect handler twice in case when spell effect is capable of targeting an object
1454  // this check was requested by scripters, but it has some downsides:
1455  // now it's impossible to script (using sEventScripts) a cast which misses all targets
1456  // or to have an ability to script the moment spell hits dest (in a case when there are object targets present)
1457  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].GetProvidedTargetMask() & (TARGET_FLAG_UNIT_MASK | TARGET_FLAG_GAMEOBJECT_MASK))
1458  return;
1459  // some spells have no target entries in dbc and they use focus target
1460  if (focusObject)
1461  target = focusObject;
1462  // TODO: there should be a possibility to pass dest target to event script
1463  }
1464 
1465  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell ScriptStart %u for spellid %u in EffectSendEvent ", m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue, m_spellInfo->Id);
1466 
1467  if (ZoneScript* zoneScript = m_caster->GetZoneScript())
1468  zoneScript->ProcessEvent(target, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
1469  else if (InstanceScript* instanceScript = m_caster->GetInstanceScript()) // needed in case Player is the caster
1470  instanceScript->ProcessEvent(target, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
1471 
1472  m_caster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(sEventScripts, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue, m_caster, target);
1473 }
1474 
1475 void Spell::EffectPowerBurn(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1476 {
1477  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1478  return;
1479 
1480  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
1481  return;
1482 
1483  Powers PowerType = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
1484 
1485  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || unitTarget->getPowerType() != PowerType || damage < 0)
1486  return;
1487 
1488  // burn x% of target's mana, up to maximum of 2x% of caster's mana (Mana Burn)
1489  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 8129)
1490  {
1491  int32 maxDamage = int32(CalculatePct(m_caster->GetMaxPower(PowerType), damage * 2));
1492  damage = int32(CalculatePct(unitTarget->GetMaxPower(PowerType), damage));
1493  damage = std::min(damage, maxDamage);
1494 
1495  // Remove fear
1496  unitTarget->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
1497  }
1498 
1499  int32 power = damage;
1500  // resilience reduce mana draining effect at spell crit damage reduction (added in 2.4)
1501  if (PowerType == POWER_MANA)
1502  power -= unitTarget->GetSpellCritDamageReduction(power);
1503 
1504  int32 newDamage = -(unitTarget->ModifyPower(PowerType, -power));
1505 
1506  // NO - Not a typo - EffectPowerBurn uses effect value multiplier - not effect damage multiplier
1507  float dmgMultiplier = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValueMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
1508 
1509  // add log data before multiplication (need power amount, not damage)
1510  ExecuteLogEffectTakeTargetPower(effIndex, unitTarget, PowerType, newDamage, 0.0f);
1511 
1512  newDamage = int32(newDamage * dmgMultiplier);
1513 
1514  m_damage += newDamage;
1515 }
1516 
1517 void Spell::EffectHeal(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1518 {
1519  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
1520  return;
1521 
1522  if (unitTarget && unitTarget->IsAlive() && damage >= 0)
1523  {
1524  // Try to get original caster
1525  Unit* caster = m_originalCasterGUID ? m_originalCaster : m_caster;
1526 
1527  // Skip if m_originalCaster not available
1528  if (!caster)
1529  return;
1530 
1531  int32 addhealth = damage;
1532 
1533  // Vessel of the Naaru (Vial of the Sunwell trinket)
1534  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45064)
1535  {
1536  // Amount of heal - depends from stacked Holy Energy
1537  int damageAmount = 0;
1538  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffect(45062, 0))
1539  {
1540  damageAmount += aurEff->GetAmount();
1541  m_caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(45062);
1542  }
1543 
1544  addhealth += damageAmount;
1545  }
1546  // Runic Healing Injector (heal increased by 25% for engineers - 3.2.0 patch change)
1547  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 67489)
1548  {
1549  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
1550  if (player->HasSkill(SKILL_ENGINEERING))
1551  AddPct(addhealth, 25);
1552  }
1553  // Swiftmend - consumes Regrowth or Rejuvenation
1554  else if (m_spellInfo->TargetAuraState == AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND && unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND, m_spellInfo, m_caster))
1555  {
1556  Unit::AuraEffectList const& RejorRegr = unitTarget->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL);
1557  // find most short by duration
1558  AuraEffect* forcedTargetAura = nullptr;
1559  AuraEffect* targetAura = nullptr;
1560  for (Unit::AuraEffectList::const_iterator i = RejorRegr.begin(); i != RejorRegr.end(); ++i)
1561  {
1562  if ((*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID
1563  && (*i)->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x50)
1564  {
1565  if (m_caster->GetGUID() == (*i)->GetCasterGUID())
1566  {
1567  if (!forcedTargetAura || (*i)->GetBase()->GetDuration() < forcedTargetAura->GetBase()->GetDuration())
1568  forcedTargetAura = *i;
1569  }
1570  else if (!targetAura || (*i)->GetBase()->GetDuration() < targetAura->GetBase()->GetDuration())
1571  targetAura = *i;
1572  }
1573  }
1574 
1575  if (forcedTargetAura)
1576  targetAura = forcedTargetAura;
1577 
1578  if (!targetAura)
1579  {
1580  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Target(%s) has aurastate AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND but no matching aura.", unitTarget->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
1581  return;
1582  }
1583 
1584  int32 tickheal = targetAura->GetAmount();
1585  if (Unit* auraCaster = targetAura->GetCaster())
1586  tickheal = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(auraCaster, targetAura->GetSpellInfo(), tickheal, DOT);
1587 
1588  //int32 tickheal = targetAura->GetSpellInfo()->EffectBasePoints[idx] + 1;
1589  //It is said that talent bonus should not be included
1590 
1591  int32 tickcount = 0;
1592  // Rejuvenation
1593  if (targetAura->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x10)
1594  tickcount = 4;
1595  // Regrowth
1596  else // if (targetAura->GetSpellInfo()->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x40)
1597  tickcount = 6;
1598 
1599  addhealth += tickheal * tickcount;
1600 
1601  // Glyph of Swiftmend
1602  if (!caster->HasAura(54824))
1603  unitTarget->RemoveAura(targetAura->GetId(), targetAura->GetCasterGUID());
1604 
1605  //addhealth += tickheal * tickcount;
1606  //addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonus(m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL, unitTarget);
1607  }
1608  // Death Pact - return pct of max health to caster
1609  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00080000)
1610  {
1611  addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, int32(caster->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage)), HEAL);
1612  addhealth = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
1613  }
1614  else if (m_spellInfo->Id != 33778) // not lifebloom
1615  {
1616  addhealth = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
1617  addhealth = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, m_spellInfo, addhealth, HEAL);
1618  }
1619 
1620  m_damage -= addhealth;
1621  }
1622 }
1623 
1624 void Spell::EffectHealPct(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1625 {
1626  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
1627  return;
1628 
1629  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || damage < 0)
1630  return;
1631 
1632  // Skip if m_originalCaster not available
1633  if (!m_originalCaster)
1634  return;
1635 
1636  uint32 heal = m_originalCaster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, unitTarget->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage), HEAL);
1637  heal = unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo, heal, HEAL);
1638 
1639  m_damage -= heal;
1640 }
1641 
1642 void Spell::EffectHealMechanical(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1643 {
1644  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
1645  return;
1646 
1647  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || damage < 0)
1648  return;
1649 
1650  // Skip if m_originalCaster not available
1651  if (!m_originalCaster)
1652  return;
1653 
1654  uint32 heal = m_originalCaster->SpellHealingBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), HEAL);
1655 
1656  m_damage -= unitTarget->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo, heal, HEAL);
1657 }
1658 
1659 void Spell::EffectHealthLeech(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1660 {
1661  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1662  return;
1663 
1664  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || damage < 0)
1665  return;
1666 
1667  damage = m_caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1668  damage = unitTarget->SpellDamageBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, uint32(damage), SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
1669 
1670  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "HealthLeech :%i", damage);
1671 
1672  // xinef: handled in spell.cpp
1673  //float healMultiplier = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValueMultiplier(m_originalCaster, this);
1674 
1675  m_damage += damage;
1676  // get max possible damage, don't count overkill for heal
1677  //uint32 healthGain = uint32(-unitTarget->GetHealthGain(-damage) * healMultiplier);
1678 
1679  //if (m_caster->IsAlive())
1680  //{
1681  // healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL);
1682  // healthGain = m_caster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(m_caster, m_spellInfo, healthGain, HEAL);
1683 
1684  // m_caster->HealBySpell(m_caster, m_spellInfo, uint32(healthGain));
1685  //}
1686 }
1687 
1688 void Spell::DoCreateItem(uint8 /*effIndex*/, uint32 itemId)
1689 {
1690  if (!unitTarget)
1691  return;
1692 
1693  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
1694  if (!player)
1695  {
1696  return;
1697  }
1698 
1699  uint32 newitemid = itemId;
1700 
1701  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(newitemid);
1702  if (!pProto)
1703  {
1704  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
1705  return;
1706  }
1707 
1708  uint32 addNumber = damage;
1709 
1710  // bg reward have some special in code work
1711  bool SelfCast = true;
1712  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
1713  {
1714  case SPELL_AV_MARK_WINNER:
1715  case SPELL_AV_MARK_LOSER:
1716  case SPELL_WS_MARK_WINNER:
1717  case SPELL_WS_MARK_LOSER:
1718  case SPELL_AB_MARK_WINNER:
1719  case SPELL_AB_MARK_LOSER:
1720  SelfCast = true;
1721  break;
1722  case SPELL_WG_MARK_WINNER:
1723  if (player->HasAura(55629 /*SPELL_LIEUTENANT*/))
1724  addNumber = 3;
1725  else if (player->HasAura(33280 /*SPELL_CORPORAL*/))
1726  addNumber = 2;
1727  else
1728  addNumber = 1;
1729  SelfCast = true;
1730  break;
1731  }
1732 
1733  if (addNumber < 1)
1734  addNumber = 1;
1735  if (addNumber > pProto->GetMaxStackSize())
1736  addNumber = pProto->GetMaxStackSize();
1737 
1738  /* == gem perfection handling == */
1739 
1740  // the chance of getting a perfect result
1741  float perfectCreateChance = 0.0f;
1742 
1743  // the resulting perfect item if successful
1744  uint32 perfectItemType = itemId;
1745 
1746  // get perfection capability and chance
1747  if (CanCreatePerfectItem(player, m_spellInfo->Id, perfectCreateChance, perfectItemType))
1748  if (roll_chance_f(perfectCreateChance)) // if the roll succeeds...
1749  newitemid = perfectItemType; // the perfect item replaces the regular one
1750 
1751  /* == gem perfection handling over == */
1752 
1753  /* == profession specialization handling == */
1754 
1755  // init items_count to 1, since 1 item will be created regardless of specialization
1756  int32 itemsCount = 1;
1757  float additionalCreateChance = 0.0f;
1758  int32 additionalMaxNum = 0;
1759  // get the chance and maximum number for creating extra items
1760  if (canCreateExtraItems(player, m_spellInfo->Id, additionalCreateChance, additionalMaxNum))
1761  {
1762  // roll with this chance till we roll not to create or we create the max num
1763  while (roll_chance_f(additionalCreateChance) && itemsCount <= additionalMaxNum)
1764  ++itemsCount;
1765  }
1766 
1767  // really will be created more items
1768  addNumber *= itemsCount;
1769 
1770  /* == profession specialization handling over == */
1771 
1772  // can the player store the new item?
1773  ItemPosCountVec dest;
1774  uint32 no_space = 0;
1775  InventoryResult msg = player->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, newitemid, addNumber, &no_space);
1776  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
1777  {
1778  // convert to possible store amount
1779  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL || msg == EQUIP_ERR_CANT_CARRY_MORE_OF_THIS)
1780  addNumber -= no_space;
1781  else
1782  {
1783  // if not created by another reason from full inventory or unique items amount limitation
1784  player->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, newitemid);
1785  return;
1786  }
1787  }
1788 
1789  if (addNumber)
1790  {
1791  // create the new item and store it
1792  Item* pItem = player->StoreNewItem(dest, newitemid, true);
1793 
1794  // was it successful? return error if not
1795  if (!pItem)
1796  {
1797  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
1798  return;
1799  }
1800 
1801  // set the "Crafted by ..." property of the item
1802  if (pItem->GetTemplate()->HasSignature())
1803  pItem->SetGuidValue(ITEM_FIELD_CREATOR, player->GetGUID());
1804 
1805  // send info to the client
1806  player->SendNewItem(pItem, addNumber, true, SelfCast);
1807 
1808  sScriptMgr->OnCreateItem(player, pItem, addNumber);
1809 
1810  // we succeeded in creating at least one item, so a levelup is possible
1811  if (SelfCast)
1812  player->UpdateCraftSkill(m_spellInfo->Id);
1813  }
1814 }
1815 
1816 void Spell::EffectCreateItem(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1817 {
1818  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1819  return;
1820 
1821  DoCreateItem(effIndex, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ItemType);
1822  ExecuteLogEffectCreateItem(effIndex, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ItemType);
1823 }
1824 
1825 void Spell::EffectCreateItem2(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1826 {
1827  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1828  return;
1829 
1830  if (!unitTarget)
1831  return;
1832 
1833  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
1834  if (!player)
1835  {
1836  return;
1837  }
1838 
1839  uint32 itemId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ItemType;
1840 
1841  if (itemId)
1842  DoCreateItem(effIndex, itemId);
1843 
1844  // special case: fake item replaced by generate using spell_loot_template
1845  if (m_spellInfo->IsLootCrafting())
1846  {
1847  if (itemId)
1848  {
1849  if (!player->HasItemCount(itemId))
1850  return;
1851 
1852  // remove reagent
1853  uint32 count = 1;
1854  player->DestroyItemCount(itemId, count, true);
1855 
1856  // create some random items
1857  player->AutoStoreLoot(m_spellInfo->Id, LootTemplates_Spell);
1858  }
1859  else
1860  player->AutoStoreLoot(m_spellInfo->Id, LootTemplates_Spell); // create some random items
1861  }
1862  // TODO: ExecuteLogEffectCreateItem(i, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
1863 }
1864 
1865 void Spell::EffectCreateRandomItem(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
1866 {
1867  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1868  return;
1869 
1870  if (!unitTarget)
1871  return;
1872 
1873  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
1874  if (!player)
1875  {
1876  return;
1877  }
1878 
1879  // create some random items
1880  player->AutoStoreLoot(m_spellInfo->Id, LootTemplates_Spell);
1881  // TODO: ExecuteLogEffectCreateItem(i, m_spellInfo->Effects[i].ItemType);
1882 }
1883 
1884 void Spell::EffectPersistentAA(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1885 {
1886  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
1887  return;
1888 
1889  if (!m_spellAura)
1890  {
1891  Unit* caster = m_caster->GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER ? m_originalCaster : m_caster;
1892  float radius = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(caster);
1893 
1894  // Caster not in world, might be spell triggered from aura removal
1895  if (!caster->IsInWorld() || !caster->FindMap() || !ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*caster, caster->GetGUID())) // pussywizard: temporary crash fix (FindMap and GetUnit are mine)
1896  return;
1897  DynamicObject* dynObj = new DynamicObject(false);
1898  if (!dynObj->CreateDynamicObject(caster->GetMap()->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::DynamicObject>(), caster, m_spellInfo->Id, *destTarget, radius, DYNAMIC_OBJECT_AREA_SPELL))
1899  {
1900  delete dynObj;
1901  return;
1902  }
1903 
1904  if (Aura* aura = Aura::TryCreate(m_spellInfo, MAX_EFFECT_MASK, dynObj, caster, &m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[0]))
1905  {
1906  m_spellAura = aura;
1907  m_spellAura->SetTriggeredByAuraSpellInfo(m_triggeredByAuraSpell.spellInfo);
1908  m_spellAura->_RegisterForTargets();
1909  }
1910  else
1911  return;
1912  }
1913 
1914  ASSERT(m_spellAura->GetDynobjOwner());
1915  m_spellAura->_ApplyEffectForTargets(effIndex);
1916 }
1917 
1918 void Spell::EffectEnergize(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
1919 {
1920  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
1921  return;
1922 
1923  if (!unitTarget)
1924  return;
1925  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
1926  return;
1927 
1928  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
1929  return;
1930 
1931  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
1932 
1933  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && unitTarget->getPowerType() != power && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_POTION
1934  && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_ONLY_IN_SPELLBOOK_UNTIL_LEARNED))
1935  return;
1936 
1937  if (unitTarget->GetMaxPower(power) == 0)
1938  return;
1939 
1940  // Some level depends spells
1941  int level_multiplier = 0;
1942  int level_diff = 0;
1943  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
1944  {
1945  case 9512: // Restore Energy
1946  level_diff = m_caster->getLevel() - 40;
1947  level_multiplier = 2;
1948  break;
1949  case 24571: // Blood Fury
1950  level_diff = m_caster->getLevel() - 60;
1951  level_multiplier = 10;
1952  break;
1953  case 24532: // Burst of Energy
1954  level_diff = m_caster->getLevel() - 60;
1955  level_multiplier = 4;
1956  break;
1957  case 31930: // Judgements of the Wise
1958  case 63375: // Improved Stormstrike
1959  case 68082: // Glyph of Seal of Command
1960  damage = int32(CalculatePct(unitTarget->GetCreateMana(), damage));
1961  break;
1962  case 48542: // Revitalize
1963  damage = int32(CalculatePct(unitTarget->GetMaxPower(power), damage));
1964  break;
1965  case 67490: // Runic Mana Injector (mana gain increased by 25% for engineers - 3.2.0 patch change)
1966  {
1967  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
1968  if (player->HasSkill(SKILL_ENGINEERING))
1969  AddPct(damage, 25);
1970  break;
1971  }
1972  case 71132: // Glyph of Shadow Word: Pain
1973  damage = int32(CalculatePct(unitTarget->GetCreateMana(), 1)); // set 1 as value, missing in dbc
1974  break;
1975  default:
1976  break;
1977  }
1978 
1979  if (level_diff > 0)
1980  damage -= level_multiplier * level_diff;
1981 
1982  if (damage < 0)
1983  return;
1984 
1985  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, damage, power);
1986 
1987  // Mad Alchemist's Potion
1988  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45051)
1989  {
1990  // find elixirs on target
1991  bool guardianFound = false;
1992  bool battleFound = false;
1993  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& Auras = unitTarget->GetAppliedAuras();
1994  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator itr = Auras.begin(); itr != Auras.end(); ++itr)
1995  {
1996  SpellGroupSpecialFlags sFlag = sSpellMgr->GetSpellGroupSpecialFlags(itr->second->GetBase()->GetId());
1997  if (!guardianFound)
1998  if (sFlag & SPELL_GROUP_SPECIAL_FLAG_ELIXIR_GUARDIAN)
1999  guardianFound = true;
2000  if (!battleFound)
2001  if (sFlag & SPELL_GROUP_SPECIAL_FLAG_ELIXIR_BATTLE)
2002  battleFound = true;
2003  if (battleFound && guardianFound)
2004  break;
2005  }
2006 
2007  // get all available elixirs by mask and spell level
2008  std::set<uint32> availableElixirs;
2009  if (!guardianFound)
2010  sSpellMgr->GetSetOfSpellsInSpellGroupWithFlag(1, SPELL_GROUP_SPECIAL_FLAG_ELIXIR_GUARDIAN, availableElixirs);
2011  if (!battleFound)
2012  sSpellMgr->GetSetOfSpellsInSpellGroupWithFlag(1, SPELL_GROUP_SPECIAL_FLAG_ELIXIR_BATTLE, availableElixirs);
2013  for (std::set<uint32>::iterator itr = availableElixirs.begin(); itr != availableElixirs.end();)
2014  {
2015  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->AssertSpellInfo(*itr);
2016  if (spellInfo->SpellLevel < m_spellInfo->SpellLevel || spellInfo->SpellLevel > unitTarget->getLevel())
2017  availableElixirs.erase(itr++);
2018  else
2019  ++itr;
2020  }
2021 
2022  if (!availableElixirs.empty())
2023  {
2024  // cast random elixir on target
2025  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, Acore::Containers::SelectRandomContainerElement(availableElixirs), true, m_CastItem);
2026  }
2027  }
2028 }
2029 
2030 void Spell::EffectEnergizePct(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2031 {
2032  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2033  return;
2034 
2035  if (!unitTarget)
2036  return;
2037  if (!unitTarget->IsAlive())
2038  return;
2039 
2040  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue < 0 || m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue >= int8(MAX_POWERS))
2041  return;
2042 
2043  Powers power = Powers(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
2044 
2045  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && unitTarget->getPowerType() != power && !m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_ONLY_IN_SPELLBOOK_UNTIL_LEARNED))
2046  return;
2047 
2048  uint32 maxPower = unitTarget->GetMaxPower(power);
2049  if (maxPower == 0)
2050  return;
2051 
2052  uint32 gain = CalculatePct(maxPower, damage);
2053  m_caster->EnergizeBySpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Id, gain, power);
2054 }
2055 
2056 void Spell::SendLoot(ObjectGuid guid, LootType loottype)
2057 {
2058  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2059  if (!player)
2060  return;
2061 
2062  if (gameObjTarget)
2063  {
2064  // Players shouldn't be able to loot gameobjects that are currently despawned
2065  if (!gameObjTarget->isSpawned() && !player->IsGameMaster())
2066  {
2067  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Possible hacking attempt: Player %s [%s] tried to loot a gameobject [%s] which is on respawn time without being in GM mode!",
2068  player->GetName().c_str(), player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), gameObjTarget->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2069  return;
2070  }
2071  // special case, already has GossipHello inside so return and avoid calling twice
2072  if (gameObjTarget->GetGoType() == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GOOBER)
2073  {
2074  gameObjTarget->Use(m_caster);
2075  return;
2076  }
2077 
2078  if (sScriptMgr->OnGossipHello(player, gameObjTarget))
2079  return;
2080 
2081  if (gameObjTarget->AI()->GossipHello(player, false))
2082  return;
2083 
2084  switch (gameObjTarget->GetGoType())
2085  {
2086  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR:
2087  gameObjTarget->UseDoorOrButton(0, false, player);
2088  return;
2089  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_BUTTON:
2090  gameObjTarget->UseDoorOrButton(0, false, player);
2091 
2092  // Xinef: properly link possible traps
2093  if (uint32 trapEntry = gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->button.linkedTrap)
2094  gameObjTarget->TriggeringLinkedGameObject(trapEntry, player);
2095  return;
2096  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_QUESTGIVER:
2097  player->PrepareGossipMenu(gameObjTarget, gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->questgiver.gossipID, true);
2098  player->SendPreparedGossip(gameObjTarget);
2099  return;
2100 
2101  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_SPELL_FOCUS:
2102  // triggering linked GO
2103  if (uint32 trapEntry = gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->spellFocus.linkedTrapId)
2104  gameObjTarget->TriggeringLinkedGameObject(trapEntry, m_caster);
2105  return;
2106 
2107  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_CHEST:
2108  // triggering linked GO
2109  if (uint32 trapEntry = gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->chest.linkedTrapId)
2110  gameObjTarget->TriggeringLinkedGameObject(trapEntry, m_caster);
2111 
2112  // Don't return, let loots been taken
2113  default:
2114  break;
2115  }
2116  }
2117 
2118  // Send loot
2119  player->SendLoot(guid, loottype);
2120 }
2121 
2122 void Spell::EffectOpenLock(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2123 {
2124  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2125  return;
2126 
2127  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2128  {
2129  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "WORLD: Open Lock - No Player Caster!");
2130  return;
2131  }
2132 
2133  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2134 
2135  uint32 lockId = 0;
2136  ObjectGuid guid;
2137 
2138  // Get lockId
2139  if (gameObjTarget)
2140  {
2141  GameObjectTemplate const* goInfo = gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo();
2142  // Arathi Basin banner opening. // TODO: Verify correctness of this check
2143  if ((goInfo->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_BUTTON && goInfo->button.noDamageImmune) ||
2144  (goInfo->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GOOBER && goInfo->goober.losOK))
2145  {
2146  //CanUseBattlegroundObject() already called in CheckCast()
2147  // in battleground check
2148  if (Battleground* bg = player->GetBattleground())
2149  {
2150  bg->EventPlayerClickedOnFlag(player, gameObjTarget);
2151  return;
2152  }
2153  }
2154  else if (goInfo->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGSTAND)
2155  {
2156  //CanUseBattlegroundObject() already called in CheckCast()
2157  // in battleground check
2158  if (Battleground* bg = player->GetBattleground())
2159  {
2160  if (bg->GetBgTypeID(true) == BATTLEGROUND_EY)
2161  bg->EventPlayerClickedOnFlag(player, gameObjTarget);
2162  return;
2163  }
2164  }
2165  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 1842 && gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_TRAP)
2166  {
2167  gameObjTarget->SetLootState(GO_JUST_DEACTIVATED);
2168  if (!gameObjTarget->GetOwner()) // pussywizard
2169  gameObjTarget->SetRespawnTime(gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->GetAutoCloseTime() / IN_MILLISECONDS/*xinef*/);
2170  return;
2171  }
2172  // TODO: Add script for spell 41920 - Filling, becouse server it freze when use this spell
2173  // handle outdoor pvp object opening, return true if go was registered for handling
2174  // these objects must have been spawned by outdoorpvp!
2175  else if (gameObjTarget->GetGOInfo()->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_GOOBER && sOutdoorPvPMgr->HandleOpenGo(player, gameObjTarget))
2176  return;
2177  lockId = goInfo->GetLockId();
2178  guid = gameObjTarget->GetGUID();
2179  }
2180  else if (itemTarget)
2181  {
2182  lockId = itemTarget->GetTemplate()->LockID;
2183  guid = itemTarget->GetGUID();
2184  }
2185  else
2186  {
2187  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "WORLD: Open Lock - No GameObject/Item Target!");
2188  return;
2189  }
2190 
2191  SkillType skillId = SKILL_NONE;
2192  int32 reqSkillValue = 0;
2193  int32 skillValue;
2194 
2195  SpellCastResult res = CanOpenLock(effIndex, lockId, skillId, reqSkillValue, skillValue);
2196  if (res != SPELL_CAST_OK)
2197  {
2198  SendCastResult(res);
2199  return;
2200  }
2201 
2202  if (gameObjTarget)
2203  SendLoot(guid, LOOT_SKINNING);
2204  else if (itemTarget)
2205  {
2206  itemTarget->SetFlag(ITEM_FIELD_FLAGS, ITEM_FIELD_FLAG_UNLOCKED);
2207  if (Player* itemOwner = itemTarget->GetOwner())
2208  itemTarget->SetState(ITEM_CHANGED, itemOwner);
2209  }
2210 
2211  // not allow use skill grow at item base open
2212  if (!m_CastItem && skillId != SKILL_NONE)
2213  {
2214  // update skill if really known
2215  if (uint32 pureSkillValue = player->GetPureSkillValue(skillId))
2216  {
2217  if (gameObjTarget)
2218  {
2219  // Allow one skill-up until respawned
2220  if (!gameObjTarget->IsInSkillupList(player->GetGUID()) && player->UpdateGatherSkill(skillId, pureSkillValue, reqSkillValue))
2221  gameObjTarget->AddToSkillupList(player->GetGUID());
2222  }
2223  else if (itemTarget)
2224  {
2225  // Do one skill-up
2226  player->UpdateGatherSkill(skillId, pureSkillValue, reqSkillValue);
2227  }
2228  }
2229  }
2230  ExecuteLogEffectOpenLock(effIndex, gameObjTarget ? (Object*)gameObjTarget : (Object*)itemTarget);
2231 }
2232 
2233 void Spell::EffectSummonChangeItem(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2234 {
2235  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
2236  return;
2237 
2238  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2239  return;
2240 
2241  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2242 
2243  // applied only to using item
2244  if (!m_CastItem)
2245  return;
2246 
2247  // ... only to item in own inventory/bank/equip_slot
2248  if (m_CastItem->GetOwnerGUID() != player->GetGUID())
2249  return;
2250 
2251  uint32 newitemid = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ItemType;
2252  if (!newitemid)
2253  return;
2254 
2255  uint16 pos = m_CastItem->GetPos();
2256 
2257  Item* pNewItem = Item::CreateItem(newitemid, 1, player);
2258  if (!pNewItem)
2259  return;
2260 
2261  for (uint8 j = PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT; j <= TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT; ++j)
2262  if (m_CastItem->GetEnchantmentId(EnchantmentSlot(j)))
2263  pNewItem->SetEnchantment(EnchantmentSlot(j), m_CastItem->GetEnchantmentId(EnchantmentSlot(j)), m_CastItem->GetEnchantmentDuration(EnchantmentSlot(j)), m_CastItem->GetEnchantmentCharges(EnchantmentSlot(j)));
2264 
2265  if (m_CastItem->GetUInt32Value(ITEM_FIELD_DURABILITY) < m_CastItem->GetUInt32Value(ITEM_FIELD_MAXDURABILITY))
2266  {
2267  double lossPercent = 1 - m_CastItem->GetUInt32Value(ITEM_FIELD_DURABILITY) / double(m_CastItem->GetUInt32Value(ITEM_FIELD_MAXDURABILITY));
2268  player->DurabilityLoss(pNewItem, lossPercent);
2269  }
2270 
2271  if (player->IsInventoryPos(pos))
2272  {
2273  ItemPosCountVec dest;
2274  InventoryResult msg = player->CanStoreItem(m_CastItem->GetBagSlot(), m_CastItem->GetSlot(), dest, pNewItem, true);
2275  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK)
2276  {
2277  player->DestroyItem(m_CastItem->GetBagSlot(), m_CastItem->GetSlot(), true);
2278 
2279  // prevent crash at access and unexpected charges counting with item update queue corrupt
2280  if (m_CastItem == m_targets.GetItemTarget())
2281  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
2282 
2283  m_CastItem = nullptr;
2284  m_castItemGUID.Clear();
2285 
2286  player->StoreItem(dest, pNewItem, true);
2287  player->ItemAddedQuestCheck(pNewItem->GetEntry(), 1);
2288  return;
2289  }
2290  }
2291  else if (player->IsBankPos(pos))
2292  {
2293  ItemPosCountVec dest;
2294  uint8 msg = player->CanBankItem(m_CastItem->GetBagSlot(), m_CastItem->GetSlot(), dest, pNewItem, true);
2295  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK)
2296  {
2297  player->DestroyItem(m_CastItem->GetBagSlot(), m_CastItem->GetSlot(), true);
2298 
2299  // prevent crash at access and unexpected charges counting with item update queue corrupt
2300  if (m_CastItem == m_targets.GetItemTarget())
2301  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
2302 
2303  m_CastItem = nullptr;
2304  m_castItemGUID.Clear();
2305 
2306  player->BankItem(dest, pNewItem, true);
2307  return;
2308  }
2309  }
2310  else if (player->IsEquipmentPos(pos))
2311  {
2312  uint16 dest;
2313 
2314  player->DestroyItem(m_CastItem->GetBagSlot(), m_CastItem->GetSlot(), true);
2315 
2316  uint8 msg = player->CanEquipItem(m_CastItem->GetSlot(), dest, pNewItem, true);
2317 
2318  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_OK || msg == EQUIP_ERR_CANT_DO_RIGHT_NOW)
2319  {
2320  if (msg == EQUIP_ERR_CANT_DO_RIGHT_NOW) dest = EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND;
2321 
2322  // prevent crash at access and unexpected charges counting with item update queue corrupt
2323  if (m_CastItem == m_targets.GetItemTarget())
2324  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
2325 
2326  m_CastItem = nullptr;
2327  m_castItemGUID.Clear();
2328 
2329  player->EquipItem(dest, pNewItem, true);
2330  player->AutoUnequipOffhandIfNeed();
2331  return;
2332  }
2333  }
2334 
2335  // fail
2336  delete pNewItem;
2337 }
2338 
2339 void Spell::EffectProficiency(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2340 {
2341  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
2342  return;
2343 
2344  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2345  return;
2346  Player* p_target = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2347 
2348  uint32 subClassMask = m_spellInfo->EquippedItemSubClassMask;
2349  if (m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON && !(p_target->GetWeaponProficiency() & subClassMask))
2350  {
2351  p_target->AddWeaponProficiency(subClassMask);
2352  p_target->SendProficiency(ITEM_CLASS_WEAPON, p_target->GetWeaponProficiency());
2353  }
2354  if (m_spellInfo->EquippedItemClass == ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR && !(p_target->GetArmorProficiency() & subClassMask))
2355  {
2356  p_target->AddArmorProficiency(subClassMask);
2357  p_target->SendProficiency(ITEM_CLASS_ARMOR, p_target->GetArmorProficiency());
2358  }
2359 }
2360 
2361 void Spell::EffectSummonType(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2362 {
2363  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
2364  return;
2365 
2366  uint32 entry = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
2367  if (!entry)
2368  return;
2369 
2370  SummonPropertiesEntry const* properties = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB);
2371  if (!properties)
2372  {
2373  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "EffectSummonType: Unhandled summon type %u", m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB);
2374  return;
2375  }
2376 
2377  if (!m_originalCaster)
2378  return;
2379 
2380  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
2381  if (Player* modOwner = m_originalCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
2382  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_DURATION, duration);
2383 
2384  TempSummon* summon = nullptr;
2385 
2386  // determine how many units should be summoned
2387  uint32 numSummons;
2388 
2389  // some spells need to summon many units, for those spells number of summons is stored in effect value
2390  // however so far noone found a generic check to find all of those (there's no related data in summonproperties.dbc
2391  // and in spell attributes, possibly we need to add a table for those)
2392  // so here's a list of MiscValueB values, which is currently most generic check
2393  switch (properties->Id)
2394  {
2395  case 64:
2396  case 61:
2397  case 1101:
2398  case 66:
2399  case 648:
2400  case 2301:
2401  case 1061:
2402  case 1261:
2403  case 629:
2404  case 181:
2405  case 715:
2406  case 1562:
2407  case 833:
2408  case 1161:
2409  case 713: // xinef, bloodworms
2410  numSummons = (damage > 0) ? damage : 1;
2411  break;
2412  default:
2413  numSummons = 1;
2414  break;
2415  }
2416 
2417  switch (properties->Category)
2418  {
2419  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_WILD:
2420  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_ALLY:
2421  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_UNK:
2422  if (properties->Flags & 512)
2423  {
2424  SummonGuardian(effIndex, entry, properties, numSummons);
2425  break;
2426  }
2427  switch (properties->Type)
2428  {
2429  case SUMMON_TYPE_PET:
2430  case SUMMON_TYPE_GUARDIAN:
2431  case SUMMON_TYPE_GUARDIAN2:
2432  case SUMMON_TYPE_MINION:
2433  SummonGuardian(effIndex, entry, properties, numSummons);
2434  break;
2435  // Summons a vehicle, but doesn't force anyone to enter it (see SUMMON_CATEGORY_VEHICLE)
2436  case SUMMON_TYPE_VEHICLE:
2437  case SUMMON_TYPE_VEHICLE2:
2438  summon = m_caster->GetMap()->SummonCreature(entry, *destTarget, properties, duration, m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo->Id);
2439  break;
2440  case SUMMON_TYPE_LIGHTWELL:
2441  case SUMMON_TYPE_TOTEM:
2442  {
2443  // protection code
2444  summon = m_caster->GetMap()->SummonCreature(entry, *destTarget, properties, duration, m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo->Id);
2445  if (!summon || !summon->IsTotem())
2446  return;
2447 
2448  // Mana Tide Totem
2449  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 16190)
2450  damage = m_caster->CountPctFromMaxHealth(10);
2451 
2452  if (damage && properties->Type != SUMMON_TYPE_LIGHTWELL) // Health set in script for lightwell
2453  {
2454  summon->SetMaxHealth(damage);
2455  summon->SetHealth(damage);
2456  }
2457  break;
2458  }
2459  case SUMMON_TYPE_JEEVES:
2460  case SUMMON_TYPE_MINIPET:
2461  {
2462  summon = m_caster->GetMap()->SummonCreature(entry, *destTarget, properties, duration, m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo->Id);
2463  if (!summon || !summon->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_MINION))
2464  return;
2465 
2466  summon->SelectLevel(); // some summoned creaters have different from 1 DB data for level/hp
2467  summon->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, summon->GetCreatureTemplate()->npcflag);
2468 
2469  summon->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PC | UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC);
2470  summon->SetReactState(REACT_PASSIVE);
2471 
2472  // Xinef: Pet can have some auras in creature_addon or in scripts, do not remove them instantly
2473  //summon->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
2474  if (properties->Type != SUMMON_TYPE_JEEVES)
2475  {
2476  summon->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false);
2477  summon->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(m_originalCaster, PET_FOLLOW_DIST, summon->GetFollowAngle(), MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
2478  }
2479  break;
2480  }
2481  default:
2482  {
2483  float radius = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius();
2484 
2485  TempSummonType summonType = (duration <= 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_DEAD_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN;
2486 
2487  for (uint32 count = 0; count < numSummons; ++count)
2488  {
2489  Position pos;
2490  if (count == 0)
2491  pos = *destTarget;
2492  else
2493  // randomize position for multiple summons
2494  pos = m_caster->GetRandomPoint(*destTarget, radius);
2495 
2496  summon = m_originalCaster->SummonCreature(entry, pos, summonType, duration);
2497  if (!summon)
2498  continue;
2499 
2500  summon->SetTempSummonType(summonType);
2501 
2502  if (properties->Category == SUMMON_CATEGORY_ALLY)
2503  {
2504  summon->SetOwnerGUID(m_originalCaster->GetGUID());
2505  summon->SetFaction(m_originalCaster->GetFaction());
2506  }
2507 
2508  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, summon);
2509  }
2510  return;
2511  }
2512  }//switch
2513  break;
2514  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PET:
2515  // Xinef: SummonGuardian function can summon a few npcs of same type, remove old summons with same entry here
2516  if (m_originalCaster)
2517  m_originalCaster->RemoveAllMinionsByEntry(entry);
2518  SummonGuardian(effIndex, entry, properties, numSummons);
2519  break;
2520  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_PUPPET:
2521  summon = m_caster->GetMap()->SummonCreature(entry, *destTarget, properties, duration, m_originalCaster, m_spellInfo->Id);
2522  break;
2523  case SUMMON_CATEGORY_VEHICLE:
2524  // Summoning spells (usually triggered by npc_spellclick) that spawn a vehicle and that cause the clicker
2525  // to cast a ride vehicle spell on the summoned unit.
2526  //float x, y, z;
2527  //m_caster->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
2528  // xinef: vehicles summoned in air, eg. Cold Hearted quest
2529  if (fabs(m_caster->GetPositionZ() - destTarget->GetPositionZ()) > 6.0f)
2530  destTarget->m_positionZ = m_caster->GetPositionZ();
2531 
2532  summon = m_originalCaster->GetMap()->SummonCreature(entry, *destTarget, properties, duration, m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id);
2533  if (!summon || !summon->IsVehicle())
2534  return;
2535
