2536  // The spell that this effect will trigger. It has SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE
2537  uint32 spellId = VEHICLE_SPELL_RIDE_HARDCODED;
2538  int32 basePoints = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValue();
2539  if (basePoints > 1) // xinef: some summoning spells have value 1 - indicates vehicle seat
2540  {
2541  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(basePoints);
2542  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE))
2543  spellId = spellInfo->Id;
2544  }
2545 
2546  // xinef: if we have small value, it indicates seat position
2547  if (basePoints > 0 && basePoints < MAX_VEHICLE_SEATS)
2548  m_originalCaster->CastCustomSpell(spellId, SPELLVALUE_BASE_POINT0, basePoints, summon, true);
2549  else
2550  m_originalCaster->CastSpell(summon, spellId, true);
2551 
2552  // xinef: i think this is wrong, found only 2 vehicles with faction override and one of them should inherit caster faction...
2553  //uint32 faction = properties->Faction;
2554  //if (!faction)
2555  uint32 faction = m_originalCaster->GetFaction();
2556 
2557  summon->SetFaction(faction);
2558  break;
2559  }
2560 
2561  if (summon)
2562  {
2563  summon->SetCreatorGUID(m_originalCaster->GetGUID());
2564  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, summon);
2565  }
2566 }
2567 
2568 void Spell::EffectLearnSpell(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2569 {
2570  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2571  return;
2572 
2573  if (!unitTarget)
2574  return;
2575 
2576  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2577  {
2578  if (unitTarget->ToPet())
2579  EffectLearnPetSpell(effIndex);
2580  return;
2581  }
2582 
2583  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
2584 
2585  uint32 spellToLearn = (m_spellInfo->Id == 483 || m_spellInfo->Id == 55884) ? damage : m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell;
2586  player->learnSpell(spellToLearn);
2587 
2588  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell: Player %s has learned spell %u from Npc %s",
2589  player->GetGUID().ToString().c_str(), spellToLearn, m_caster->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2590 }
2591 
2592 typedef std::list<std::pair<uint32, ObjectGuid>> DispelList;
2593 void Spell::EffectDispel(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2594 {
2595  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2596  return;
2597 
2598  if (!unitTarget)
2599  return;
2600 
2601  // Create dispel mask by dispel type
2602  uint32 dispel_type = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
2603  uint32 dispelMask = SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(dispel_type));
2604 
2605  DispelChargesList dispel_list;
2606  unitTarget->GetDispellableAuraList(m_caster, dispelMask, dispel_list);
2607  if (dispel_list.empty())
2608  return;
2609 
2610  // Ok if exist some buffs for dispel try dispel it
2611  uint32 failCount = 0;
2612  DispelChargesList success_list;
2613  WorldPacket dataFail(SMSG_DISPEL_FAILED, 8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + damage * 4);
2614  // dispel N = damage buffs (or while exist buffs for dispel)
2615  for (int32 count = 0; count < damage && !dispel_list.empty();)
2616  {
2617  // Random select buff for dispel
2618  DispelChargesList::iterator itr = dispel_list.begin();
2619  std::advance(itr, urand(0, dispel_list.size() - 1));
2620 
2621  int32 chance = itr->first->CalcDispelChance(unitTarget, !unitTarget->IsFriendlyTo(m_caster));
2622  // 2.4.3 Patch Notes: "Dispel effects will no longer attempt to remove effects that have 100% dispel resistance."
2623  if (!chance)
2624  {
2625  dispel_list.erase(itr);
2626  continue;
2627  }
2628  else
2629  {
2630  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
2631  {
2632  bool alreadyListed = false;
2633  for (DispelChargesList::iterator successItr = success_list.begin(); successItr != success_list.end(); ++successItr)
2634  {
2635  if (successItr->first->GetId() == itr->first->GetId())
2636  {
2637  ++successItr->second;
2638  alreadyListed = true;
2639  }
2640  }
2641  if (!alreadyListed)
2642  success_list.push_back(std::make_pair(itr->first, 1));
2643  --itr->second;
2644  if (itr->second <= 0)
2645  dispel_list.erase(itr);
2646  }
2647  else
2648  {
2649  if (!failCount)
2650  {
2651  // Failed to dispell
2652  dataFail << m_caster->GetGUID(); // Caster GUID
2653  dataFail << unitTarget->GetGUID(); // Victim GUID
2654  dataFail << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // dispel spell id
2655  }
2656  ++failCount;
2657  dataFail << uint32(itr->first->GetId()); // Spell Id
2658  }
2659  ++count;
2660  }
2661  }
2662 
2663  if (failCount)
2664  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&dataFail, true);
2665 
2666  // put in combat
2667  if (unitTarget->IsFriendlyTo(m_caster))
2668  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, 0.0f, m_spellInfo);
2669 
2670  if (success_list.empty())
2671  return;
2672 
2673  WorldPacket dataSuccess(SMSG_SPELLDISPELLOG, 8 + 8 + 4 + 1 + 4 + success_list.size() * 5);
2674  // Send packet header
2675  dataSuccess << unitTarget->GetPackGUID(); // Victim GUID
2676  dataSuccess << m_caster->GetPackGUID(); // Caster GUID
2677  dataSuccess << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // dispel spell id
2678  dataSuccess << uint8(0); // not used
2679  dataSuccess << uint32(success_list.size()); // count
2680  for (DispelChargesList::iterator itr = success_list.begin(); itr != success_list.end(); ++itr)
2681  {
2682  // Send dispelled spell info
2683  dataSuccess << uint32(itr->first->GetId()); // Spell Id
2684  dataSuccess << uint8(0); // 0 - dispelled !=0 cleansed
2685  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpellByDispel(itr->first->GetId(), m_spellInfo->Id, itr->first->GetCasterGUID(), m_caster, itr->second);
2686  }
2687  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&dataSuccess, true);
2688 
2689  // On success dispel
2690  // Devour Magic
2691  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && m_spellInfo->GetCategory() == SPELLCATEGORY_DEVOUR_MAGIC)
2692  {
2693  int32 heal_amount = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue();
2694  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 19658, &heal_amount, nullptr, nullptr, true);
2695  // Glyph of Felhunter
2696  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
2697  if (owner->GetAura(56249))
2698  owner->CastCustomSpell(owner, 19658, &heal_amount, nullptr, nullptr, true);
2699  }
2700 }
2701 
2702 void Spell::EffectDualWield(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2703 {
2704  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2705  return;
2706 
2707  unitTarget->SetCanDualWield(true);
2708 }
2709 
2710 void Spell::EffectPull(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2711 {
2712  // TODO: create a proper pull towards distract spell center for distract
2713  EffectNULL(effIndex);
2714 }
2715 
2716 void Spell::EffectDistract(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2717 {
2718  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2719  return;
2720 
2721  // Check for possible target
2722  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsInCombat())
2723  return;
2724 
2725  // target must be OK to do this
2726  if (unitTarget->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED | UNIT_STATE_STUNNED | UNIT_STATE_FLEEING))
2727  return;
2728 
2729  unitTarget->SetFacingTo(unitTarget->GetAngle(destTarget));
2730  unitTarget->ClearUnitState(UNIT_STATE_MOVING);
2731 
2732  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2733  unitTarget->GetMotionMaster()->MoveDistract(damage * IN_MILLISECONDS);
2734 }
2735 
2736 void Spell::EffectPickPocket(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2737 {
2738  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2739  return;
2740 
2741  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2742  return;
2743 
2744  // victim must be creature and attackable
2745  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unitTarget))
2746  return;
2747 
2748  // victim have to be alive and humanoid or undead
2749  if (unitTarget->IsAlive() && (unitTarget->GetCreatureTypeMask() &CREATURE_TYPEMASK_HUMANOID_OR_UNDEAD) != 0)
2750  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendLoot(unitTarget->GetGUID(), LOOT_PICKPOCKETING);
2751 }
2752 
2753 void Spell::EffectAddFarsight(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2754 {
2755  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
2756  return;
2757 
2758  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2759  return;
2760 
2761  float radius = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius();
2762  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
2763  // Caster not in world, might be spell triggered from aura removal
2764  if (!m_caster->IsInWorld())
2765  return;
2766 
2767  DynamicObject* dynObj = new DynamicObject(true);
2768  if (!dynObj->CreateDynamicObject(m_caster->GetMap()->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::DynamicObject>(), m_caster, m_spellInfo->Id, *destTarget, radius, DYNAMIC_OBJECT_FARSIGHT_FOCUS))
2769  {
2770  delete dynObj;
2771  return;
2772  }
2773 
2774  dynObj->SetDuration(duration);
2775  dynObj->SetCasterViewpoint();
2776 }
2777 
2778 void Spell::EffectUntrainTalents(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2779 {
2780  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2781  return;
2782 
2783  if (!unitTarget || m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2784  return;
2785 
2786  if (ObjectGuid guid = m_caster->GetGUID()) // the trainer is the caster
2787  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->SendTalentWipeConfirm(guid);
2788 }
2789 
2790 void Spell::EffectTeleUnitsFaceCaster(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2791 {
2792  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2793  return;
2794 
2795  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsInFlight())
2796  return;
2797 
2798  if (m_targets.HasDst())
2799  {
2800  unitTarget->NearTeleportTo(destTarget->GetPositionX(), destTarget->GetPositionY(), destTarget->GetPositionZ(), destTarget->GetAbsoluteAngle(m_caster), unitTarget == m_caster);
2801  }
2802 }
2803 
2804 void Spell::EffectLearnSkill(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2805 {
2806  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2807  return;
2808 
2809  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2810  return;
2811 
2812  if (damage < 0)
2813  return;
2814 
2815  uint32 skillid = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
2816  uint16 skillval = unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetPureSkillValue(skillid);
2817  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->SetSkill(skillid, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValue(), skillval ? skillval : 1, damage * 75);
2818 }
2819 
2820 void Spell::EffectAddHonor(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2821 {
2822  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2823  return;
2824 
2825  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2826  return;
2827 
2828  // not scale value for item based reward (/10 value expected)
2829  if (m_CastItem)
2830  {
2831  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->RewardHonor(nullptr, 1, damage / 10, false);
2832  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SpellEffect::AddHonor (spell_id %u) rewards %d honor points (item %u) for player: %s",
2833  m_spellInfo->Id, damage / 10, m_CastItem->GetEntry(), unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2834  return;
2835  }
2836 
2837  // do not allow to add too many honor for player (50 * 21) = 1040 at level 70, or (50 * 31) = 1550 at level 80
2838  if (damage <= 50)
2839  {
2840  uint32 honor_reward = Acore::Honor::hk_honor_at_level(unitTarget->getLevel(), float(damage));
2841  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->RewardHonor(nullptr, 1, honor_reward, false);
2842  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SpellEffect::AddHonor (spell_id %u) rewards %u honor points (scale) to player: %s",
2843  m_spellInfo->Id, honor_reward, unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2844  }
2845  else
2846  {
2847  //maybe we have correct honor_gain in damage already
2848  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->RewardHonor(nullptr, 1, damage, false);
2849  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "SpellEffect::AddHonor (spell_id %u) rewards %u honor points (non scale) for player: %s",
2850  m_spellInfo->Id, damage, unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetGUID().ToString().c_str());
2851  }
2852 }
2853 
2854 void Spell::EffectTradeSkill(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
2855 {
2856  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
2857  return;
2858 
2859  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2860  return;
2861  // uint32 skillid = m_spellInfo->Effects[i].MiscValue;
2862  // uint16 skillmax = unitTarget->ToPlayer()->(skillid);
2863  // m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetSkill(skillid, skillval?skillval:1, skillmax+75);
2864 }
2865 
2866 void Spell::EffectEnchantItemPerm(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2867 {
2868  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2869  return;
2870 
2871  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2872  return;
2873  if (!itemTarget)
2874  return;
2875 
2876  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2877 
2878  // Handle vellums
2879  if (itemTarget->IsWeaponVellum() || itemTarget->IsArmorVellum())
2880  {
2881  // destroy one vellum from stack
2882  uint32 count = 1;
2883  p_caster->DestroyItemCount(itemTarget, count, true);
2884  unitTarget = p_caster;
2885  // and add a scroll
2886  DoCreateItem(effIndex, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].ItemType);
2887  itemTarget = nullptr;
2888  m_targets.SetItemTarget(nullptr);
2889  }
2890  else
2891  {
2892  // do not increase skill if vellum used
2893  if (!(m_CastItem && m_CastItem->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_NO_REAGENT_COST))
2894  p_caster->UpdateCraftSkill(m_spellInfo->Id);
2895 
2896  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
2897  if (!enchant_id)
2898  return;
2899 
2900  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
2901  if (!pEnchant)
2902  return;
2903 
2904  // item can be in trade slot and have owner diff. from caster
2905  Player* item_owner = itemTarget->GetOwner();
2906  if (!item_owner)
2907  return;
2908 
2909  // remove old enchanting before applying new if equipped
2910  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, false);
2911 
2912  itemTarget->SetEnchantment(PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, enchant_id, 0, 0, m_caster->GetGUID());
2913 
2914  // add new enchanting if equipped
2915  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PERM_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, true);
2916 
2917  item_owner->RemoveTradeableItem(itemTarget);
2918  itemTarget->ClearSoulboundTradeable(item_owner);
2919  }
2920 }
2921 
2922 void Spell::EffectEnchantItemPrismatic(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2923 {
2924  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2925  return;
2926 
2927  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2928  return;
2929  if (!itemTarget)
2930  return;
2931 
2932  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
2933  if (!enchant_id)
2934  return;
2935 
2936  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
2937  if (!pEnchant)
2938  return;
2939 
2940  // support only enchantings with add socket in this slot
2941  {
2942  bool add_socket = false;
2943  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_EFFECTS; ++i)
2944  {
2945  if (pEnchant->type[i] == ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_PRISMATIC_SOCKET)
2946  {
2947  add_socket = true;
2948  break;
2949  }
2950  }
2951  if (!add_socket)
2952  {
2953  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectEnchantItemPrismatic: attempt apply enchant spell %u with SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_PRISMATIC (%u) but without ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_PRISMATIC_SOCKET (%u), not suppoted yet.",
2954  m_spellInfo->Id, SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_PRISMATIC, ITEM_ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_PRISMATIC_SOCKET);
2955  return;
2956  }
2957  }
2958 
2959  // item can be in trade slot and have owner diff. from caster
2960  Player* item_owner = itemTarget->GetOwner();
2961  if (!item_owner)
2962  return;
2963 
2964  // remove old enchanting before applying new if equipped
2965  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PRISMATIC_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, false);
2966 
2967  itemTarget->SetEnchantment(PRISMATIC_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, enchant_id, 0, 0, m_caster->GetGUID());
2968 
2969  // add new enchanting if equipped
2970  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, PRISMATIC_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, true);
2971 
2972  item_owner->RemoveTradeableItem(itemTarget);
2973  itemTarget->ClearSoulboundTradeable(item_owner);
2974 }
2975 
2976 void Spell::EffectEnchantItemTmp(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
2977 {
2978  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
2979  return;
2980 
2981  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2982  return;
2983 
2984  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
2985 
2986  // Rockbiter Weapon apply to both weapon
2987  if (!itemTarget)
2988  return;
2989  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x400000)
2990  {
2991  uint32 spell_id = 0;
2992 
2993  // enchanting spell selected by calculated damage-per-sec stored in Effect[1] base value
2994  // Note: damage calculated (correctly) with rounding int32(float(v)) but
2995  // RW enchantments applied damage int32(float(v)+0.5), this create 0..1 difference sometime
2996  switch (damage)
2997  {
2998  // Rank 1
2999  case 2:
3000  spell_id = 36744;
3001  break; // 0% [ 7% == 2, 14% == 2, 20% == 2]
3002  // Rank 2
3003  case 4:
3004  spell_id = 36753;
3005  break; // 0% [ 7% == 4, 14% == 4]
3006  case 5:
3007  spell_id = 36751;
3008  break; // 20%
3009  // Rank 3
3010  case 6:
3011  spell_id = 36754;
3012  break; // 0% [ 7% == 6, 14% == 6]
3013  case 7:
3014  spell_id = 36755;
3015  break; // 20%
3016  // Rank 4
3017  case 9:
3018  spell_id = 36761;
3019  break; // 0% [ 7% == 6]
3020  case 10:
3021  spell_id = 36758;
3022  break; // 14%
3023  case 11:
3024  spell_id = 36760;
3025  break; // 20%
3026  default:
3027  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectEnchantItemTmp: Damage %u not handled in S'RW", damage);
3028  return;
3029  }
3030 
3031  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
3032  if (!spellInfo)
3033  {
3034  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell::EffectEnchantItemTmp: unknown spell id %i", spell_id);
3035  return;
3036  }
3037 
3038  for (int j = BASE_ATTACK; j <= OFF_ATTACK; ++j)
3039  {
3040  if (Item* item = p_caster->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(j)))
3041  {
3042  if (item->IsFitToSpellRequirements(m_spellInfo))
3043  {
3044  Spell* spell = new Spell(m_caster, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK);
3045  SpellCastTargets targets;
3046  targets.SetItemTarget(item);
3047  spell->prepare(&targets);
3048  }
3049  }
3050  }
3051  return;
3052  }
3053  if (!itemTarget)
3054  return;
3055 
3056  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
3057 
3058  if (!enchant_id)
3059  {
3060  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell %u Effect %u (SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_TEMPORARY) have 0 as enchanting id", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
3061  return;
3062  }
3063 
3064  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
3065  if (!pEnchant)
3066  {
3067  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Spell %u Effect %u (SPELL_EFFECT_ENCHANT_ITEM_TEMPORARY) have not existed enchanting id %u ", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex, enchant_id);
3068  return;
3069  }
3070 
3071  // select enchantment duration
3072  uint32 duration;
3073 
3074  // rogue family enchantments exception by duration
3075  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 38615)
3076  duration = 1800; // 30 mins
3077  // other rogue family enchantments always 1 hour (some have spell damage=0, but some have wrong data in EffBasePoints)
3078  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE)
3079  duration = 3600; // 1 hour
3080  // shaman family enchantments
3081  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN)
3082  duration = 1800; // 30 mins
3083  // other cases with this SpellVisual already selected
3084  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 215)
3085  duration = 1800; // 30 mins
3086  // some fishing pole bonuses except Glow Worm which lasts full hour
3087  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 563 && m_spellInfo->Id != 64401)
3088  duration = 600; // 10 mins
3089  // shaman rockbiter enchantments
3090  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellVisual[0] == 0)
3091  duration = 1800; // 30 mins
3092  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 29702)
3093  duration = 300; // 5 mins
3094  else if (m_spellInfo->Id == 37360)
3095  duration = 300; // 5 mins
3096  // default case
3097  else
3098  duration = 3600; // 1 hour
3099 
3100  // item can be in trade slot and have owner diff. from caster
3101  Player* item_owner = itemTarget->GetOwner();
3102  if (!item_owner)
3103  return;
3104 
3105  // remove old enchanting before applying new if equipped
3106  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, false);
3107 
3108  itemTarget->SetEnchantment(TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, enchant_id, duration * 1000, pEnchant->charges, m_caster->GetGUID());
3109 
3110  // add new enchanting if equipped
3111  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(itemTarget, TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT, true);
3112 
3113  item_owner->RemoveTradeableItem(itemTarget);
3114  itemTarget->ClearSoulboundTradeable(item_owner);
3115 }
3116 
3117 void Spell::EffectTameCreature(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
3118 {
3119  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3120  return;
3121 
3122  if (m_caster->GetPetGUID())
3123  return;
3124 
3125  if (!unitTarget)
3126  return;
3127 
3128  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
3129  return;
3130 
3131  Creature* creatureTarget = unitTarget->ToCreature();
3132 
3133  if (creatureTarget->IsPet())
3134  return;
3135 
3136  if (m_caster->getClass() != CLASS_HUNTER)
3137  return;
3138 
3139  // cast finish successfully
3140  //SendChannelUpdate(0);
3141  finish();
3142 
3143  Pet* pet = m_caster->CreateTamedPetFrom(creatureTarget, m_spellInfo->Id);
3144  if (!pet) // in very specific state like near world end/etc.
3145  return;
3146 
3147  // "kill" original creature
3148  creatureTarget->DespawnOrUnsummon();
3149 
3150  uint8 level = (creatureTarget->getLevel() < (m_caster->getLevel() - 5)) ? (m_caster->getLevel() - 5) : creatureTarget->getLevel();
3151 
3152  // prepare visual effect for levelup
3153  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL, level - 1);
3154 
3155  // add to world
3156  pet->GetMap()->AddToMap(pet->ToCreature(), true);
3157 
3158  // visual effect for levelup
3159  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_LEVEL, level);
3160 
3161  // caster have pet now
3162  m_caster->SetMinion(pet, true);
3163 
3164  pet->InitTalentForLevel();
3165 
3166  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3167  {
3168  pet->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, false);
3169  m_caster->ToPlayer()->PetSpellInitialize();
3170  }
3171 }
3172 
3173 void Spell::EffectSummonPet(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3174 {
3175  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
3176  return;
3177 
3178  if (!m_originalCaster)
3179  return;
3180 
3181  uint32 petentry = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
3182  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
3183 
3184  if(Player* modOwner = m_originalCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
3185  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_DURATION, duration);
3186 
3187  Player* owner = m_originalCaster->ToPlayer();
3188  if (!owner && m_originalCaster->ToCreature()->IsTotem())
3189  owner = m_originalCaster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
3190 
3191  if (!owner)
3192  {
3193  SummonPropertiesEntry const* properties = sSummonPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(67);
3194  if (properties)
3195  {
3196  // Xinef: unsummon old guardian
3197  if (Guardian* oldPet = m_originalCaster->GetGuardianPet())
3198  oldPet->UnSummon();
3199  SummonGuardian(effIndex, petentry, properties, 1);
3200  }
3201  return;
3202  }
3203 
3204  Pet* OldSummon = owner->GetPet();
3205 
3206  // if pet requested type already exist
3207  if (OldSummon)
3208  {
3209  if (petentry == 0 || OldSummon->GetEntry() == petentry)
3210  {
3211  // pet in corpse state can't be summoned
3212  if (OldSummon->isDead())
3213  return;
3214 
3215  ASSERT(OldSummon->GetMap() == owner->GetMap());
3216 
3217  //OldSummon->GetMap()->Remove(OldSummon->ToCreature(), false);
3218 
3219  float px, py, pz;
3220  owner->GetClosePoint(px, py, pz, OldSummon->GetObjectSize());
3221 
3222  OldSummon->NearTeleportTo(px, py, pz, OldSummon->GetOrientation());
3223  OldSummon->UpdateObjectVisibility();
3224 
3225  OldSummon->SetHealth(OldSummon->GetMaxHealth());
3226  OldSummon->SetPower(OldSummon->getPowerType(), OldSummon->GetMaxPower(OldSummon->getPowerType()));
3227  // notify player
3228  for (CreatureSpellCooldowns::const_iterator itr = OldSummon->m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.begin(); itr != OldSummon->m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.end(); ++itr)
3229  owner->SendClearCooldown(itr->first, OldSummon);
3230 
3231  // actually clear cooldowns
3232  OldSummon->m_CreatureSpellCooldowns.clear();
3233  Unit::AuraApplicationMap& myAuras = OldSummon->GetAppliedAuras();
3234  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::iterator i = myAuras.begin(); i != myAuras.end();)
3235  {
3236  Aura const* aura = i->second->GetBase();
3237  if (!aura->IsPassive() && aura->CanBeSentToClient())
3238  OldSummon->RemoveAura(i);
3239  else
3240  ++i;
3241  }
3242  return;
3243  }
3244 
3245  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3246  owner->ToPlayer()->RemovePet(OldSummon, (OldSummon->getPetType() == HUNTER_PET ? PET_SAVE_AS_DELETED : PET_SAVE_NOT_IN_SLOT), false);
3247  else
3248  return;
3249  }
3250 
3251  float x, y, z;
3252  owner->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, owner->GetObjectSize());
3253  owner->SummonPet(petentry, x, y, z, owner->GetOrientation(), SUMMON_PET, 0, m_spellInfo->Id, m_caster->GetGUID(), PET_LOAD_SUMMON_PET);
3254  //if (!pet)
3255  // return;
3256 
3257  // xinef: cant execute this... :( hope nothing relevant gets bugged
3258  //ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, pet);
3259 }
3260 
3261 void Spell::EffectLearnPetSpell(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3262 {
3263  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3264  return;
3265 
3266  if (!unitTarget)
3267  return;
3268 
3269  if (unitTarget->ToPlayer())
3270  {
3271  EffectLearnSpell(effIndex);
3272  return;
3273  }
3274  Pet* pet = unitTarget->ToPet();
3275  if (!pet)
3276  return;
3277 
3278  SpellInfo const* learn_spellproto = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell);
3279  if (!learn_spellproto)
3280  return;
3281 
3282  pet->learnSpell(learn_spellproto->Id);
3283  pet->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, false);
3284  pet->GetOwner()->PetSpellInitialize();
3285 }
3286 
3287 void Spell::EffectTaunt(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
3288 {
3289  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3290  return;
3291 
3292  if (!unitTarget)
3293  return;
3294 
3295  // xinef: Hand of Reckoning, cast before checing canhavethreatlist. fixes damage against pets
3296  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 62124 && unitTarget->GetVictim() != m_caster)
3297  {
3298  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 67485, true);
3299  unitTarget->CombatStart(m_caster);
3300  }
3301 
3302  // this effect use before aura Taunt apply for prevent taunt already attacking target
3303  // for spell as marked "non effective at already attacking target"
3304  if (!unitTarget->CanHaveThreatList() || (unitTarget->GetVictim() == m_caster && !m_spellInfo->HasAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TAUNT)))
3305  {
3306  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_DONT_REPORT);
3307  return;
3308  }
3309 
3310  if (!unitTarget->getThreatMgr().getOnlineContainer().empty())
3311  {
3312  // Also use this effect to set the taunter's threat to the taunted creature's highest value
3313  float myThreat = unitTarget->getThreatMgr().getThreat(m_caster);
3314  float topThreat = unitTarget->getThreatMgr().getOnlineContainer().getMostHated()->getThreat();
3315  if (topThreat > myThreat)
3316  unitTarget->getThreatMgr().doAddThreat(m_caster, topThreat - myThreat);
3317 
3318  //Set aggro victim to caster
3319  if (HostileReference* forcedVictim = unitTarget->getThreatMgr().getOnlineContainer().getReferenceByTarget(m_caster))
3320  unitTarget->getThreatMgr().setCurrentVictim(forcedVictim);
3321  }
3322 
3323  if (unitTarget->ToCreature()->IsAIEnabled && !unitTarget->ToCreature()->HasReactState(REACT_PASSIVE))
3324  unitTarget->ToCreature()->AI()->AttackStart(m_caster);
3325 }
3326 
3327 void Spell::EffectWeaponDmg(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3328 {
3329  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
3330  return;
3331 
3332  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
3333  return;
3334 
3335  // multiple weapon dmg effect workaround
3336  // execute only the last weapon damage
3337  // and handle all effects at once
3338  for (uint32 j = effIndex + 1; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
3339  {
3340  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect)
3341  {
3342  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
3343  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
3344  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
3345  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
3346  return; // we must calculate only at last weapon effect
3347  break;
3348  }
3349  }
3350 
3351  // some spell specific modifiers
3352  float totalDamagePercentMod = 100.0f; // applied to final bonus+weapon damage
3353  int32 spell_bonus = 0; // bonus specific for spell
3354 
3355  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
3356  {
3357  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
3358  {
3359  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3360  {
3361  // Trial of the Champion, Black Knight, Obliterate
3362  case 67725:
3363  case 67883:
3364  {
3365  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, unitTarget->GetDiseasesByCaster(m_caster->GetGUID(), 1) * 30.0f);
3366  break;
3367  }
3368  // sweeping strikes
3369  case 26654:
3370  {
3371  this->damage = 0;
3372  m_damage = m_spellValue->EffectBasePoints[effIndex];
3373  return;
3374  }
3375  }
3376  break;
3377  }
3378  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
3379  {
3380  // Devastate (player ones)
3381  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x40)
3382  {
3383  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 58567, true);
3384 
3385  if (Aura* aur = unitTarget->GetAura(58567))
3386  {
3387  // 58388 - Glyph of Devastate dummy aura.
3388  if (m_caster->HasAura(58388))
3389  aur->ModStackAmount(1);
3390 
3391  spell_bonus += (aur->GetStackAmount() - 1) * CalculateSpellDamage(2, unitTarget);
3392  }
3393  }
3394  break;
3395  }
3396  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
3397  {
3398  // Fan of Knives, Hemorrhage, Ghostly Strike
3399  if ((m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x40000)
3400  || (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x6000000))
3401  {
3402  // Hemorrhage
3403  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x2000000)
3404  {
3405  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3406  m_caster->ToPlayer()->AddComboPoints(unitTarget, 1);
3407  }
3408  // 50% more damage with daggers
3409  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3410  if (Item* item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetWeaponForAttack(m_attackType, true))
3411  if (item->GetTemplate()->SubClass == ITEM_SUBCLASS_WEAPON_DAGGER)
3412  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, 50.0f);
3413  }
3414  // Mutilate (for each hand)
3415  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x6)
3416  {
3417  bool found = false;
3418  // fast check
3419  if (unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEADLY_POISON, m_spellInfo, m_caster))
3420  found = true;
3421  // full aura scan
3422  else
3423  {
3424  Unit::AuraApplicationMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetAppliedAuras();
3425  for (Unit::AuraApplicationMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
3426  {
3427  if (itr->second->GetBase()->GetSpellInfo()->Dispel == DISPEL_POISON)
3428  {
3429  found = true;
3430  break;
3431  }
3432  }
3433  }
3434 
3435  if (found)
3436  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, 20.0f); // 120% if poisoned
3437  }
3438  break;
3439  }
3440  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
3441  {
3442  // Seal of Command Unleashed
3443  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 20467)
3444  {
3445  spell_bonus += int32(0.08f * m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK));
3446  spell_bonus += int32(0.13f * m_caster->SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(m_spellInfo->GetSchoolMask()));
3447  }
3448  break;
3449  }
3450  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
3451  {
3452  // Skyshatter Harness item set bonus
3453  // Stormstrike
3454  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = m_caster->IsScriptOverriden(m_spellInfo, 5634))
3455  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 38430, true, nullptr, aurEff);
3456  // Lava lash damage increased by Flametongue weapon
3457  if (m_caster->GetAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY, SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN, 688, EFFECT_0))
3458  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, 25.0f);
3459  break;
3460  }
3461  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
3462  {
3463  // Mangle (Cat): CP
3464  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x400)
3465  {
3466  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3467  m_caster->ToPlayer()->AddComboPoints(unitTarget, 1);
3468  }
3469  // Shred, Maul - Rend and Tear
3470  else if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x00008800 && unitTarget->HasAuraState(AURA_STATE_BLEEDING))
3471  {
3472  if (AuraEffect const* rendAndTear = m_caster->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, 2859, 0))
3473  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, rendAndTear->GetAmount());
3474  }
3475  break;
3476  }
3477  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
3478  {
3479  // Kill Shot
3480  if( m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x800000 )
3481  {
3482  spell_bonus += int32(m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(RANGED_ATTACK) * 0.4f);
3483  }
3484  break;
3485  }
3486  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
3487  {
3488  // Plague Strike
3489  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x1)
3490  {
3491  // Glyph of Plague Strike
3492  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffect(58657, EFFECT_0))
3493  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, aurEff->GetAmount());
3494  break;
3495  }
3496  // Blood Strike
3497  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x400000)
3498  {
3499  float disease_amt = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcValue();
3500  //Death Knight T8 Melee 4P Bonus
3501  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffectDummy(64736) )
3502  AddPct(disease_amt, aurEff->GetAmount());
3503 
3504  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, disease_amt * unitTarget->GetDiseasesByCaster(m_caster->GetGUID()) / 2.0f);
3505 
3506  // Glyph of Blood Strike
3507  if (m_caster->GetAuraEffect(59332, EFFECT_0))
3508  if (unitTarget->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED))
3509  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, 20.0f);
3510  break;
3511  }
3512  // Death Strike
3513  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x10)
3514  {
3515  // Glyph of Death Strike
3516  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffect(59336, EFFECT_0))
3517  if (uint32 runic = std::min<uint32>(m_caster->GetPower(POWER_RUNIC_POWER), aurEff->GetSpellInfo()->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue()))
3518  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, runic);
3519  break;
3520  }
3521  // Obliterate (12.5% more damage per disease)
3522  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x20000)
3523  {
3524  bool consumeDiseases = true;
3525  // Annihilation
3526  if (AuraEffect const* aurEff = m_caster->GetDummyAuraEffect(SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT, 2710, EFFECT_0))
3527  // Do not consume diseases if roll sucesses
3528  if (roll_chance_i(aurEff->GetAmount()))
3529  consumeDiseases = false;
3530 
3531  float disease_amt = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcValue();
3532  //Death Knight T8 Melee 4P Bonus
3533  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffectDummy(64736) )
3534  AddPct(disease_amt, aurEff->GetAmount());
3535 
3536  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, disease_amt * unitTarget->GetDiseasesByCaster(m_caster->GetGUID(), consumeDiseases) / 2.0f);
3537  break;
3538  }
3539  // Blood-Caked Strike - Blood-Caked Blade
3540  if (m_spellInfo->SpellIconID == 1736)
3541  {
3542  int32 weaponDamage = m_caster->CalculateDamage(m_attackType, false, true);
3543  ApplyPct(weaponDamage, std::min(uint32(3), unitTarget->GetDiseasesByCaster(m_caster->GetGUID())) * 12.5f);
3544  spell_bonus = weaponDamage;
3545  break;
3546  }
3547  // Heart Strike
3548  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & 0x1000000)
3549  {
3550  float disease_amt = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_2].CalcValue();
3551  //Death Knight T8 Melee 4P Bonus
3552  if (AuraEffect* aurEff = m_caster->GetAuraEffectDummy(64736) )
3553  AddPct(disease_amt, aurEff->GetAmount());
3554 
3555  AddPct(totalDamagePercentMod, disease_amt * unitTarget->GetDiseasesByCaster(m_caster->GetGUID()));
3556  break;
3557  }
3558  // Rune Strike
3559  if (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[1] & 0x20000000)
3560  {
3561  spell_bonus += int32(0.15f * m_caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK));
3562  }
3563 
3564  break;
3565  }
3566  }
3567 
3568  bool normalized = false;
3569  float weaponDamagePercentMod = 100.0f;
3570  int32 fixed_bonus = 0;
3571 
3572  // xinef: Divine Storm deals normalized damage
3573  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 53385)
3574  normalized = true;
3575 
3576  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
3577  {
3578  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect)
3579  {
3580  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
3581  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
3582  fixed_bonus += CalculateSpellDamage(j, unitTarget);
3583  break;
3584  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
3585  fixed_bonus += CalculateSpellDamage(j, unitTarget);
3586  normalized = true;
3587  break;
3588  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
3589  ApplyPct(weaponDamagePercentMod, CalculateSpellDamage(j, unitTarget));
3590  break;
3591  default:
3592  break; // not weapon damage effect, just skip
3593  }
3594  }
3595 
3596  // apply to non-weapon bonus weapon total pct effect, weapon total flat effect included in weapon damage
3597  if (fixed_bonus || spell_bonus)
3598  {
3599  UnitMods unitMod;
3600  switch (m_attackType)
3601  {
3602  default:
3603  case BASE_ATTACK:
3604  unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND;
3605  break;
3606  case OFF_ATTACK:
3607  unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND;
3608  break;
3609  case RANGED_ATTACK:
3610  unitMod = UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED;
3611  break;
3612  }
3613 
3614  if (m_spellInfo->SchoolMask & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
3615  {
3616  float weapon_total_pct = m_caster->GetModifierValue(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT);
3617  fixed_bonus = int32(fixed_bonus * weapon_total_pct);
3618  spell_bonus = int32(spell_bonus * weapon_total_pct);
3619  }
3620  }
3621 
3622  int32 weaponDamage = 0;
3623  // Dancing Rune Weapon
3624  if (m_caster->GetEntry() == 27893)
3625  {
3626  if (Unit* owner = m_caster->GetOwner())
3627  weaponDamage = owner->CalculateDamage(m_attackType, normalized, true);
3628  }
3629  else
3630  weaponDamage = m_caster->CalculateDamage(m_attackType, normalized, true);
3631 
3632  // Sequence is important
3633  for (int j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
3634  {
3635  // We assume that a spell have at most one fixed_bonus
3636  // and at most one weaponDamagePercentMod
3637  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[j].Effect)
3638  {
3639  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE:
3640  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_DAMAGE_NOSCHOOL:
3641  case SPELL_EFFECT_NORMALIZED_WEAPON_DMG:
3642  weaponDamage += fixed_bonus;
3643  break;
3644  case SPELL_EFFECT_WEAPON_PERCENT_DAMAGE:
3645  ApplyPct(weaponDamage, weaponDamagePercentMod);
3646  default:
3647  break; // not weapon damage effect, just skip
3648  }
3649  }
3650 
3651  weaponDamage += spell_bonus;
3652  ApplyPct(weaponDamage, totalDamagePercentMod);
3653 
3654  // prevent negative damage
3655  uint32 eff_damage(std::max(weaponDamage, 0));
3656 
3657  // Add melee damage bonuses (also check for negative)
3658  eff_damage = m_caster->MeleeDamageBonusDone(unitTarget, eff_damage, m_attackType, m_spellInfo);
3659  eff_damage = unitTarget->MeleeDamageBonusTaken(m_caster, eff_damage, m_attackType, m_spellInfo);
3660 
3661  // Meteor like spells (divided damage to targets)
3662  if (m_spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR0_CU_SHARE_DAMAGE))
3663  {
3664  uint32 count = 0;
3665  for (std::list<TargetInfo>::iterator ihit = m_UniqueTargetInfo.begin(); ihit != m_UniqueTargetInfo.end(); ++ihit)
3666  if (ihit->effectMask & (1 << effIndex))
3667  ++count;
3668 
3669  eff_damage /= count; // divide to all targets
3670  }
3671 
3672  m_damage += eff_damage;
3673 }
3674 
3675 void Spell::EffectThreat(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
3676 {
3677  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3678  return;
3679 
3680  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || !m_caster->IsAlive())
3681  return;
3682 
3683  // xinef: skip if target cannot have threat list or caster is friendly (ghoul leap)
3684  if (!unitTarget->CanHaveThreatList() || m_caster->IsFriendlyTo(unitTarget))
3685  return;
3686 
3687  unitTarget->AddThreat(m_caster, float(damage));
3688 }
3689 
3690 void Spell::EffectHealMaxHealth(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
3691 {
3692  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3693  return;
3694 
3695  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
3696  return;
3697 
3698  int32 addhealth = 0;
3699 
3700  // damage == 0 - heal for caster max health
3701  if (damage == 0)
3702  addhealth = m_caster->GetMaxHealth();
3703  else
3704  addhealth = unitTarget->GetMaxHealth() - unitTarget->GetHealth();
3705 
3706  m_healing += addhealth;
3707 }
3708 
3709 void Spell::EffectInterruptCast(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3710 {
3711  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3712  return;
3713 
3714  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
3715  return;
3716 
3717  // TODO: not all spells that used this effect apply cooldown at school spells
3718  // also exist case: apply cooldown to interrupted cast only and to all spells
3719  // there is no CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL spells that can be interrupted
3720  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_AUTOREPEAT_SPELL; ++i)
3721  {
3722  if (Spell* spell = unitTarget->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
3723  {
3724  SpellInfo const* curSpellInfo = spell->m_spellInfo;
3725  // check if we can interrupt spell
3726  if ((spell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_CASTING
3727  || (spell->getState() == SPELL_STATE_PREPARING && spell->GetCastTime() > 0.0f))
3728  && curSpellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE
3729  && ((i == CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL && curSpellInfo->InterruptFlags & SPELL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INTERRUPT)
3730  || (i == CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL && curSpellInfo->ChannelInterruptFlags & CHANNEL_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INTERRUPT)))
3731  {
3732  if (m_originalCaster)
3733  {
3734  int32 duration = m_originalCaster->ModSpellDuration(m_spellInfo, unitTarget, m_originalCaster->CalcSpellDuration(m_spellInfo), false, 1 << effIndex);
3735  unitTarget->ProhibitSpellSchool(curSpellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), duration/*spellInfo->GetDuration()*/);
3736  }
3737  ExecuteLogEffectInterruptCast(effIndex, unitTarget, curSpellInfo->Id);
3738  unitTarget->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
3739  }
3740  }
3741  }
3742 
3743  // Spell Lock
3744  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 19647)
3745  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].TriggerSpell, true);
3746 }
3747 
3748 void Spell::EffectSummonObjectWild(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3749 {
3750  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
3751  return;
3752 
3753  uint32 gameobject_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
3754 
3755  GameObject* pGameObj = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(gameobject_id) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
3756 
3757  WorldObject* target = focusObject;
3758  if (!target)
3759  target = m_caster;
3760 
3761  float x, y, z;
3762  if (m_targets.HasDst())
3763  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
3764  else
3765  m_caster->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
3766 
3767  Map* map = target->GetMap();
3768 
3769  if (!pGameObj->Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), gameobject_id, map, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, target->GetOrientation(), G3D::Quat(), 100, GO_STATE_READY))
3770  {
3771  delete pGameObj;
3772  return;
3773  }
3774 
3775  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
3776 
3777  pGameObj->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration / IN_MILLISECONDS : 0);
3778  pGameObj->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
3779 
3780  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, pGameObj);
3781 
3782  // Wild object not have owner and check clickable by players
3783  map->AddToMap(pGameObj, true);
3784 
3785  if (pGameObj->GetGoType() == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FLAGDROP)
3786  if (Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer())
3787  if (Battleground* bg = player->GetBattleground())
3788  bg->SetDroppedFlagGUID(pGameObj->GetGUID(), player->GetTeamId() == TEAM_ALLIANCE ? TEAM_HORDE : TEAM_ALLIANCE);
3789 
3790  if (GameObject* linkedTrap = pGameObj->GetLinkedTrap())
3791  {
3792  linkedTrap->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration/IN_MILLISECONDS :0);
3793  linkedTrap->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
3794  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, linkedTrap);
3795  }
3796 }
3797 
3798 void Spell::EffectScriptEffect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
3799 {
3800  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
3801  return;
3802 
3803  // TODO: we must implement hunter pet summon at login there (spell 6962)
3804 
3805  switch (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
3806  {
3807  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
3808  {
3809  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
3810  {
3811  case 55693: // Remove Collapsing Cave Aura
3812  if (!unitTarget)
3813  return;
3814  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcValue());
3815  break;
3816  // Bending Shinbone
3817  case 8856:
3818  {
3819  if (!itemTarget && m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3820  return;
3821 
3822  uint32 spell_id = roll_chance_i(20) ? 8854 : 8855;
3823 
3824  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_id, true, nullptr);
3825  return;
3826  }
3827  // Brittle Armor - need remove one 24575 Brittle Armor aura
3828  case 24590:
3829  unitTarget->RemoveAuraFromStack(24575);
3830  return;
3831  // Mercurial Shield - need remove one 26464 Mercurial Shield aura
3832  case 26465:
3833  unitTarget->RemoveAuraFromStack(26464);
3834  return;
3835  // Shadow Flame (All script effects, not just end ones to prevent player from dodging the last triggered spell)
3836  case 22539:
3837  case 22972:
3838  case 22975:
3839  case 22976:
3840  case 22977:
3841  case 22978:
3842  case 22979:
3843  case 22980:
3844  case 22981:
3845  case 22982:
3846  case 22983:
3847  case 22984:
3848  case 22985:
3849  {
3850  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive())
3851  return;
3852 
3853  // Onyxia Scale Cloak
3854  if (unitTarget->HasAura(22683))
3855  return;
3856 
3857  // Shadow Flame
3858  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 22682, true);
3859  return;
3860  }
3861  // Mirren's Drinking Hat
3862  case 29830:
3863  {
3864  uint32 itemId = 23586; // Aerie Peak Pale Ale
3865  switch (urand(0, 5))
3866  {
3867  case 0:
3868  case 1:
3869  case 2:
3870  itemId = 23584;
3871  break; // Loch Modan Lager
3872  case 3:
3873  case 4:
3874  itemId = 23585;
3875  break; // Stouthammer Lite
3876  }
3877  DoCreateItem(effIndex, itemId);
3878  break;
3879  }
3880  case 20589: // Escape artist
3881  case 30918: // Improved Sprint
3882  {
3883  // Removes snares and roots.
3884  unitTarget->RemoveMovementImpairingAuras(true);
3885  break;
3886  }
3887  // Plant Warmaul Ogre Banner
3888  case 32307:
3889  if (Player* caster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
3890  {
3891  caster->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(18388, unitTarget);
3892  if (Creature* target = unitTarget->ToCreature())
3893  {
3894  target->setDeathState(CORPSE);
3895  target->RemoveCorpse();
3896  }
3897  }
3898  break;
3899  // SOTA defender teleport
3900  case 54640:
3901  {
3902  if (Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer())
3903  if (player->GetBattleground() && player->GetBattleground()->GetBgTypeID(true) == BATTLEGROUND_SA)
3904  {
3905  if (GameObject* dportal = player->FindNearestGameObject(192819, 10.0f))
3906  {
3907  BattlegroundSA* bg = ((BattlegroundSA*)player->GetBattleground());
3908  bg->DefendersPortalTeleport(dportal, player);
3909  }
3910  }
3911  return;
3912  }
3913  /*// Mug Transformation
3914  case 41931:
3915  {
3916  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3917  return;
3918 
3919  uint8 bag = 19;
3920  uint8 slot = 0;
3921  Item* item = nullptr;
3922 
3923  while (bag) // 256 = 0 due to var type
3924  {
3925  item = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(bag, slot);
3926  if (item && item->GetEntry() == 38587)
3927  break;
3928 
3929  ++slot;
3930  if (slot == 39)
3931  {
3932  slot = 0;
3933  ++bag;
3934  }
3935  }
3936  if (bag)
3937  {
3938  if (m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(bag, slot)->GetCount() == 1) m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveItem(bag, slot, true);
3939  else m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(bag, slot)->SetCount(m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetItemByPos(bag, slot)->GetCount()-1);
3940  // Spell 42518 (Braufest - Gratisprobe des Braufest herstellen)
3941  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 42518, true);
3942  return;
3943  }
3944  break;
3945  }*/
3946  // Roll Dice - Decahedral Dwarven Dice
3947  case 47770:
3948  {
3949  char buf[128];
3950  const char* gender = "his";
3951  if (m_caster->getGender() > 0)
3952  gender = "her";
3953  sprintf(buf, "%s rubs %s [Decahedral Dwarven Dice] between %s hands and rolls. One %u and one %u.", m_caster->GetName().c_str(), gender, gender, urand(1, 10), urand(1, 10));
3954  m_caster->TextEmote(buf);
3955  break;
3956  }
3957  // Roll 'dem Bones - Worn Troll Dice
3958  case 47776:
3959  {
3960  char buf[128];
3961  const char* gender = "his";
3962  if (m_caster->getGender() > 0)
3963  gender = "her";
3964  sprintf(buf, "%s causually tosses %s [Worn Troll Dice]. One %u and one %u.", m_caster->GetName().c_str(), gender, urand(1, 6), urand(1, 6));
3965  m_caster->TextEmote(buf);
3966  break;
3967  }
3968  // Death Knight Initiate Visual
3969  case 51519:
3970  {
3971  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
3972  return;
3973 
3974  uint32 iTmpSpellId = 0;
3975  switch (unitTarget->GetDisplayId())
3976  {
3977  case 25369:
3978  iTmpSpellId = 51552;
3979  break; // bloodelf female
3980  case 25373:
3981  iTmpSpellId = 51551;
3982  break; // bloodelf male
3983  case 25363:
3984  iTmpSpellId = 51542;
3985  break; // draenei female
3986  case 25357:
3987  iTmpSpellId = 51541;
3988  break; // draenei male
3989  case 25361:
3990  iTmpSpellId = 51537;
3991  break; // dwarf female
3992  case 25356:
3993  iTmpSpellId = 51538;
3994  break; // dwarf male
3995  case 25372:
3996  iTmpSpellId = 51550;
3997  break; // forsaken female
3998  case 25367:
3999  iTmpSpellId = 51549;
4000  break; // forsaken male
4001  case 25362:
4002  iTmpSpellId = 51540;
4003  break; // gnome female
4004  case 25359:
4005  iTmpSpellId = 51539;
4006  break; // gnome male
4007  case 25355:
4008  iTmpSpellId = 51534;
4009  break; // human female
4010  case 25354:
4011  iTmpSpellId = 51520;
4012  break; // human male
4013  case 25360:
4014  iTmpSpellId = 51536;
4015  break; // nightelf female
4016  case 25358:
4017  iTmpSpellId = 51535;
4018  break; // nightelf male
4019  case 25368:
4020  iTmpSpellId = 51544;
4021  break; // orc female
4022  case 25364:
4023  iTmpSpellId = 51543;
4024  break; // orc male
4025  case 25371:
4026  iTmpSpellId = 51548;
4027  break; // tauren female
4028  case 25366:
4029  iTmpSpellId = 51547;
4030  break; // tauren male
4031  case 25370:
4032  iTmpSpellId = 51545;
4033  break; // troll female
4034  case 25365:
4035  iTmpSpellId = 51546;
4036  break; // troll male
4037  default:
4038  return;
4039  }
4040 
4041  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, iTmpSpellId, true);
4042  Creature* npc = unitTarget->ToCreature();
4043  npc->LoadEquipment();
4044  return;
4045  }
4046  // Deathbolt from Thalgran Blightbringer
4047  // reflected by Freya's Ward
4048  // Retribution by Sevenfold Retribution
4049  case 51854:
4050  {
4051  if (!unitTarget)
4052  return;
4053  if (unitTarget->HasAura(51845))
4054  unitTarget->CastSpell(m_caster, 51856, true);
4055  else
4056  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 51855, true);
4057  break;
4058  }
4059  case 52173: // Coyote Spirit Despawn
4060  case 60243: // Blood Parrot Despawn
4061  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && unitTarget->ToCreature()->IsSummon())
4062  unitTarget->ToTempSummon()->UnSummon();
4063  return;
4064  case 57347: // Retrieving (Wintergrasp RP-GG pickup spell)
4065  {
4066  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4067  return;
4068 
4069  unitTarget->ToCreature()->DespawnOrUnsummon();
4070 
4071  return;
4072  }
4073  case 57349: // Drop RP-GG (Wintergrasp RP-GG at death drop spell)
4074  {
4075  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4076  return;
4077 
4078  // Delete item from inventory at death
4079  m_caster->ToPlayer()->DestroyItemCount(damage, 5, true);
4080 
4081  return;
4082  }
4083  case 58418: // Portal to Orgrimmar
4084  case 58420: // Portal to Stormwind
4085  {
4086  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || effIndex != 0)
4087  return;
4088 
4089  uint32 spellID = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_0].CalcValue();
4090  uint32 questID = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_1].CalcValue();
4091 
4092  if (unitTarget->ToPlayer()->GetQuestStatus(questID) == QUEST_STATUS_COMPLETE)
4093  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, spellID, true);
4094 
4095  return;
4096  }
4097  case 59317: // Teleporting
4098  {
4099  if (!unitTarget)
4100  return;
4101 
4102  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4103  if (!player)
4104  {
4105  return;
4106  }
4107 
4108  // return from top
4109  if (player->GetAreaId() == 4637)
4110  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 59316, true);
4111  // teleport atop
4112  else
4113  unitTarget->CastSpell(unitTarget, 59314, true);
4114 
4115  return;
4116  }
4117  case 60123: // Lightwell
4118  {
4119  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !m_caster->ToCreature()->IsSummon())
4120  return;
4121 
4122  uint32 spell_heal;
4123 
4124  switch (m_caster->GetEntry())
4125  {
4126  case 31897:
4127  spell_heal = 7001;
4128  break;
4129  case 31896:
4130  spell_heal = 27873;
4131  break;
4132  case 31895:
4133  spell_heal = 27874;
4134  break;
4135  case 31894:
4136  spell_heal = 28276;
4137  break;
4138  case 31893:
4139  spell_heal = 48084;
4140  break;
4141  case 31883:
4142  spell_heal = 48085;
4143  break;
4144  default:
4145  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "Unknown Lightwell spell caster %u", m_caster->GetEntry());
4146  return;
4147  }
4148 
4149  // proc a spellcast
4150  if (Aura* chargesAura = m_caster->GetAura(59907))
4151  {
4152  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, spell_heal, true, nullptr, nullptr, m_caster->ToTempSummon()->GetSummonerGUID());
4153  if (chargesAura->ModCharges(-1))
4154  m_caster->ToTempSummon()->UnSummon();
4155  }
4156 
4157  return;
4158  }
4159  // Stoneclaw Totem
4160  case 55328: // Rank 1
4161  case 55329: // Rank 2
4162  case 55330: // Rank 3
4163  case 55332: // Rank 4
4164  case 55333: // Rank 5
4165  case 55335: // Rank 6
4166  case 55278: // Rank 7
4167  case 58589: // Rank 8
4168  case 58590: // Rank 9
4169  case 58591: // Rank 10
4170  {
4171  int32 basepoints0 = damage;
4172  // Cast Absorb on totems
4173  for (uint8 slot = SUMMON_SLOT_TOTEM; slot < MAX_TOTEM_SLOT; ++slot)
4174  {
4175  if (!unitTarget->m_SummonSlot[slot])
4176  continue;
4177 
4178  Creature* totem = unitTarget->GetMap()->GetCreature(unitTarget->m_SummonSlot[slot]);
4179  if (totem && totem->IsTotem())
4180  {
4181  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(totem, 55277, &basepoints0, nullptr, nullptr, true);
4182  }
4183  }
4184  // Glyph of Stoneclaw Totem
4185  if (AuraEffect* aur = unitTarget->GetAuraEffect(63298, 0))
4186  {
4187  basepoints0 *= aur->GetAmount();
4188  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(unitTarget, 55277, &basepoints0, nullptr, nullptr, true);
4189  }
4190  break;
4191  }
4192  case 61263: // for item Intravenous Healing Potion (44698)
4193  {
4194  if( !m_caster || !unitTarget )
4195  return;
4196 
4197  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 61267, true);
4198  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 61268, true);
4199  return;
4200  }
4201  }
4202  break;
4203  }
4204  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
4205  {
4206  switch( m_spellInfo->Id )
4207  {
4208  // Master of Subtlety
4209  case 31666:
4210  {
4211  if( !unitTarget )
4212  return;
4213 
4214  Aura* mos = unitTarget->GetAura(31665);
4215  if( mos )
4216  {
4217  mos->SetMaxDuration(6000);
4218  mos->SetDuration(6000, true);
4219  }
4220 
4221  break;
4222  }
4223  // Overkill
4224  case 58428:
4225  {
4226  if( !unitTarget )
4227  return;
4228 
4229  Aura* overkill = unitTarget->GetAura(58427);
4230  if( overkill )
4231  {
4232  overkill->SetMaxDuration(20000);
4233  overkill->SetDuration(20000, true);
4234  }
4235 
4236  break;
4237  }
4238  }
4239  break;
4240  }
4241  }
4242 
4243  // normal DB scripted effect
4244  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Spell ScriptStart spellid %u in EffectScriptEffect(%u)", m_spellInfo->Id, effIndex);
4245  m_caster->GetMap()->ScriptsStart(sSpellScripts, uint32(m_spellInfo->Id | (effIndex << 24)), m_caster, unitTarget);
4246 }
4247 
4248 void Spell::EffectSanctuary(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4249 {
4250  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4251  return;
4252 
4253  if (!unitTarget)
4254  return;
4255 
4256  if (unitTarget->GetInstanceScript() && unitTarget->GetInstanceScript()->IsEncounterInProgress())
4257  {
4258  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().UpdateVisibility(true);
4259  // Xinef: replaced with CombatStop(false)
4260  unitTarget->AttackStop();
4261  unitTarget->RemoveAllAttackers();
4262 
4263  // Night Elf: Shadowmeld only resets threat temporarily
4264  if (m_spellInfo->Id != 59646)
4265  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().addThreatPercent(-100);
4266 
4267  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4268  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->SendAttackSwingCancelAttack(); // melee and ranged forced attack cancel
4269  }
4270  else
4271  {
4272  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().UpdateVisibility(m_spellInfo->Id == 59646); // Night Elf: Shadowmeld
4273  unitTarget->CombatStop(true);
4274  }
4275 
4276  UnitList targets;
4277  Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(unitTarget, unitTarget, unitTarget->GetVisibilityRange()); // no VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION, distance is enough
4278  Acore::UnitListSearcher<Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(unitTarget, targets, u_check);
4279  Cell::VisitAllObjects(unitTarget, searcher, unitTarget->GetVisibilityRange());
4280  for (UnitList::iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
4281  {
4282  if (!(*iter)->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4283  continue;
4284 
4285  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; i++)
4286  {
4287  if ((*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i) && (*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i)->m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() == unitTarget->GetGUID())
4288  {
4289  const SpellInfo* si = (*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(i)->GetSpellInfo();
4290  if (si->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT) && (*iter)->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4291  {
4292  Creature* c = (*iter)->ToCreature();
4293  if ((!c->IsPet() && c->GetCreatureTemplate()->rank == CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS) || c->isWorldBoss() || c->IsDungeonBoss())
4294  continue;
4295  }
4296  bool interrupt = false; // pussywizard: skip spells that don't target units, but casted on unit (eg. TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY)
4297  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
4298  if (si->Effects[j].Effect && (si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT || si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT_AND_DEST))
4299  {
4300  // at least one effect truly targets an unit, interrupt the spell
4301  interrupt = true;
4302  break;
4303  }
4304  if (interrupt)
4305  (*iter)->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
4306  }
4307  }
4308  }
4309 
4310  // Xinef: Set last sanctuary time
4311  unitTarget->m_lastSanctuaryTime = World::GetGameTimeMS();
4312 
4313  // Vanish allows to remove all threat and cast regular stealth so other spells can be used
4314  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER
4315  && m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE
4316  && (m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyFlags[0] & SPELLFAMILYFLAG_ROGUE_VANISH))
4317  {
4318  m_caster->ToPlayer()->RemoveAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT);
4319 
4320  //Clean Escape
4321  if (m_caster->HasAura(23582))
4322  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 23583, true);
4323  }
4324 }
4325 
4326 void Spell::EffectAddComboPoints(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4327 {
4328  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4329  return;
4330 
4331  if (!m_caster->m_movedByPlayer || !unitTarget || damage <= 0)
4332  return;
4333 
4334  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 14157 || // Ruthlessness and Netherblade set
4335  m_spellInfo->Id == 70802) // xinef: mayhem, rogue t10p4
4336  {
4337  m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->SetComboPointGain(m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->GetComboPointGain() + damage);
4338  return;
4339  }
4340 
4341  m_caster->m_movedByPlayer->ToPlayer()->AddComboPoints(unitTarget, damage);
4342 }
4343 
4344 void Spell::EffectDuel(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4345 {
4346  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4347  return;
4348 
4349  if (!unitTarget || m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4350  return;
4351 
4352  Player* caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4353  Player* target = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4354 
4355  // caster or target already have requested duel
4356  if (caster->duel || target->duel || !target->GetSocial() || target->GetSocial()->HasIgnore(caster->GetGUID()))
4357  return;
4358 
4359  // Players can only fight a duel in zones with this flag
4360  AreaTableEntry const* casterAreaEntry = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(caster->GetAreaId());
4361  if (casterAreaEntry && !(casterAreaEntry->flags & AREA_FLAG_ALLOW_DUELS))
4362  {
4363  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_NO_DUELING); // Dueling isn't allowed here
4364  return;
4365  }
4366 
4367  AreaTableEntry const* targetAreaEntry = sAreaTableStore.LookupEntry(target->GetAreaId());
4368  if (targetAreaEntry && !(targetAreaEntry->flags & AREA_FLAG_ALLOW_DUELS))
4369  {
4370  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_NO_DUELING); // Dueling isn't allowed here
4371  return;
4372  }
4373 
4374  //CREATE DUEL FLAG OBJECT
4375  uint32 gameobject_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
4376  GameObject* pGameObj = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(gameobject_id) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
4377 
4378  Map* map = m_caster->GetMap();
4379  if (!pGameObj->Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), gameobject_id,
4380  map, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(),
4381  m_caster->GetPositionX() + (unitTarget->GetPositionX() - m_caster->GetPositionX()) / 2,
4382  m_caster->GetPositionY() + (unitTarget->GetPositionY() - m_caster->GetPositionY()) / 2,
4383  m_caster->GetPositionZ(),
4384  m_caster->GetOrientation(), G3D::Quat(), 0, GO_STATE_READY))
4385  {
4386  delete pGameObj;
4387  return;
4388  }
4389 
4390  pGameObj->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_FACTION, m_caster->GetFaction());
4391  pGameObj->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_LEVEL, m_caster->getLevel() + 1);
4392  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
4393  pGameObj->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration / IN_MILLISECONDS : 0);
4394  pGameObj->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
4395 
4396  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, pGameObj);
4397 
4398  m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj);
4399  map->AddToMap(pGameObj, true);
4400  //END
4401 
4402  // Send request
4403  WorldPacket data(SMSG_DUEL_REQUESTED, 8 + 8);
4404  data << pGameObj->GetGUID();
4405  data << caster->GetGUID();
4406  caster->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4407  target->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4408 
4409  // create duel-info
4410  DuelInfo* duel = new DuelInfo;
4411  duel->initiator = caster;
4412  duel->opponent = target;
4413  duel->startTime = 0;
4414  duel->startTimer = 0;
4415  duel->isMounted = (GetSpellInfo()->Id == 62875); // Mounted Duel
4416  caster->duel = duel;
4417 
4418  DuelInfo* duel2 = new DuelInfo;
4419  duel2->initiator = caster;
4420  duel2->opponent = caster;
4421  duel2->startTime = 0;
4422  duel2->startTimer = 0;
4423  duel2->isMounted = (GetSpellInfo()->Id == 62875); // Mounted Duel
4424  target->duel = duel2;
4425 
4426  caster->SetGuidValue(PLAYER_DUEL_ARBITER, pGameObj->GetGUID());
4427  target->SetGuidValue(PLAYER_DUEL_ARBITER, pGameObj->GetGUID());
4428 
4429  sScriptMgr->OnPlayerDuelRequest(target, caster);
4430 }
4431 
4432 void Spell::EffectStuck(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4433 {
4434  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4435  return;
4436 
4437  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4438  return;
4439 
4440  Player* target = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4441  if (target->IsInFlight())
4442  return;
4443 
4444  // xinef: if player is dead - teleport to graveyard
4445  if (!target->IsAlive())
4446  {
4447  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION))
4448  return;
4449 
4450  // xinef: player is in corpse
4451  if (!target->HasFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_GHOST))
4452  target->BuildPlayerRepop();
4453  target->RepopAtGraveyard();
4454  return;
4455  }
4456 
4457  // xinef: no hearthstone in bag or on cooldown
4458  Item* hearthStone = target->GetItemByEntry(6948);
4459  if (!hearthStone || target->HasSpellCooldown(8690))
4460  {
4461  float o = rand_norm() * 2 * M_PI;
4462  Position pos = *target;
4463  target->MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, 5.0f, o);
4464  target->NearTeleportTo(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY(), pos.GetPositionZ(), target->GetOrientation());
4465  return;
4466  }
4467 
4468  // xinef: we have hearthstone not on cooldown, just use it
4469  target->CastSpell(target, 8690, TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK & ~TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SPELL_AND_CATEGORY_CD));
4470 }
4471 
4472 void Spell::EffectSummonPlayer(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4473 {
4474  // workaround - this effect should not use target map
4475  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4476  return;
4477 
4478  if (!unitTarget)
4479  return;
4480 
4481  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4482  if (!player)
4483  {
4484  return;
4485  }
4486 
4487  // Evil Twin (ignore player summon, but hide this for summoner)
4488  // Xinef: Unit Target may be on other map!!!, Need workaround
4489  if (unitTarget->HasAura(23445))
4490  return;
4491 
4492  float x, y, z;
4493  m_caster->GetPosition(x, y, z);
4494 
4495  player->SetSummonPoint(m_caster->GetMapId(), x, y, z);
4496 
4497  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SUMMON_REQUEST, 8 + 4 + 4);
4498  data << m_caster->GetGUID(); // summoner guid
4499  data << uint32(m_caster->GetZoneId()); // summoner zone
4500  data << uint32(MAX_PLAYER_SUMMON_DELAY * IN_MILLISECONDS); // auto decline after msecs
4501  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
4502 }
4503 
4504 void Spell::EffectActivateObject(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4505 {
4506  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4507  return;
4508 
4509  if (!gameObjTarget)
4510  return;
4511 
4512  Player* player = m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? m_caster->ToPlayer() : m_caster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
4513  gameObjTarget->Use(player ? player : m_caster);
4514 
4515  //ScriptInfo activateCommand;
4516  //activateCommand.command = SCRIPT_COMMAND_ACTIVATE_OBJECT;
4517 
4518  // int32 unk = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue; // This is set for EffectActivateObject spells; needs research
4519 
4520  // xinef: pass player to allow gossip scripts to work
4521  //
4522  //gameObjTarget->GetMap()->ScriptCommandStart(activateCommand, 0, player ? player : m_caster, gameObjTarget);
4523 }
4524 
4525 void Spell::EffectApplyGlyph(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4526 {
4527  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4528  return;
4529 
4530  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_glyphIndex >= MAX_GLYPH_SLOT_INDEX)
4531  return;
4532 
4533  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4534 
4535  // glyph sockets level requirement
4536  uint8 minLevel = 0;
4537  switch (m_glyphIndex)
4538  {
4539  case 0:
4540  case 1:
4541  minLevel = 15;
4542  break;
4543  case 2:
4544  minLevel = 50;
4545  break;
4546  case 3:
4547  minLevel = 30;
4548  break;
4549  case 4:
4550  minLevel = 70;
4551  break;
4552  case 5:
4553  minLevel = 80;
4554  break;
4555  }
4556  if (minLevel && m_caster->getLevel() < minLevel)
4557  {
4558  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_GLYPH_SOCKET_LOCKED);
4559  return;
4560  }
4561 
4562  // apply new one
4563  if (uint32 glyph = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue)
4564  {
4565  if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* glyphEntry = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(glyph))
4566  {
4567  if (GlyphSlotEntry const* glyphSlotEntry = sGlyphSlotStore.LookupEntry(player->GetGlyphSlot(m_glyphIndex)))
4568  {
4569  if (glyphEntry->TypeFlags != glyphSlotEntry->TypeFlags)
4570  {
4571  SendCastResult(SPELL_FAILED_INVALID_GLYPH);
4572  return; // glyph slot mismatch
4573  }
4574  }
4575 
4576  // remove old glyph aura
4577  if (uint32 oldGlyph = player->GetGlyph(m_glyphIndex))
4578  if (GlyphPropertiesEntry const* oldGlyphEntry = sGlyphPropertiesStore.LookupEntry(oldGlyph))
4579  {
4580  player->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(oldGlyphEntry->SpellId);
4581  player->SendLearnPacket(oldGlyphEntry->SpellId, false); // Send packet to properly handle client-side spell tooltips
4582  }
4583 
4584  player->SendLearnPacket(glyphEntry->SpellId, true); // Send packet to properly handle client-side spell tooltips
4585  player->CastSpell(m_caster, glyphEntry->SpellId, TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_FULL_MASK & ~(TRIGGERED_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT | TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CASTER_AURASTATE)));
4586  player->SetGlyph(m_glyphIndex, glyph, !player->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
4587  player->SendTalentsInfoData(false);
4588  }
4589  }
4590 }
4591 
4592 void Spell::EffectEnchantHeldItem(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4593 {
4594  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4595  return;
4596 
4597  // this is only item spell effect applied to main-hand weapon of target player (players in area)
4598  if (!unitTarget)
4599  return;
4600 
4601  Player* item_owner = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4602  if (!item_owner)
4603  {
4604  return;
4605  }
4606 
4607  Item* item = item_owner->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
4608  if (!item)
4609  return;
4610 
4611  // must be equipped
4612  if (!item->IsEquipped())
4613  return;
4614 
4615  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue)
4616  {
4617  uint32 enchant_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
4618  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration(); //Try duration index first ..
4619  if (!duration)
4620  duration = damage * IN_MILLISECONDS; //+1; //Base points after ..
4621  if (!duration)
4622  duration = 10 * IN_MILLISECONDS; //10 seconds for enchants which don't have listed duration
4623 
4624  // Xinef: Venomhide poison, no other spell uses this effect...
4625  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 14792)
4626  duration = 5 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
4627 
4628  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(enchant_id);
4629  if (!pEnchant)
4630  return;
4631 
4632  // Always go to temp enchantment slot
4633  EnchantmentSlot slot = TEMP_ENCHANTMENT_SLOT;
4634 
4635  // Enchantment will not be applied if a different one already exists
4636  if (item->GetEnchantmentId(slot) && item->GetEnchantmentId(slot) != enchant_id)
4637  return;
4638 
4639  // Apply the temporary enchantment
4640  item->SetEnchantment(slot, enchant_id, duration, pEnchant->charges, m_caster->GetGUID());
4641  item_owner->ApplyEnchantment(item, slot, true);
4642  }
4643 }
4644 
4645 void Spell::EffectDisEnchant(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4646 {
4647  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4648  return;
4649 
4650  if (!itemTarget || !itemTarget->GetTemplate()->DisenchantID)
4651  return;
4652 
4653  if (Player* caster = m_caster->ToPlayer())
4654  {
4655  caster->UpdateCraftSkill(m_spellInfo->Id);
4656  caster->SendLoot(itemTarget->GetGUID(), LOOT_DISENCHANTING);
4657  }
4658 
4659  // item will be removed at disenchanting end
4660 }
4661 
4662 void Spell::EffectInebriate(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4663 {
4664  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4665  return;
4666 
4667  if (!unitTarget)
4668  return;
4669 
4670  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4671  if (!player)
4672  {
4673  return;
4674  }
4675 
4676  uint8 currentDrunk = player->GetDrunkValue();
4677  uint8 drunkMod = damage;
4678  if (currentDrunk + drunkMod > 100)
4679  {
4680  currentDrunk = 100;
4681  if (rand_chance() < 25.0f)
4682  player->CastSpell(player, 67468, false); // Drunken Vomit
4683  }
4684  else
4685  currentDrunk += drunkMod;
4686 
4687  player->SetDrunkValue(currentDrunk, m_CastItem ? m_CastItem->GetEntry() : 0);
4688 }
4689 
4690 void Spell::EffectFeedPet(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4691 {
4692  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4693  return;
4694 
4695  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
4696  if (!player)
4697  return;
4698 
4699  Item* foodItem = itemTarget;
4700  if (!foodItem)
4701  return;
4702 
4703  Pet* pet = player->GetPet();
4704  if (!pet)
4705  return;
4706 
4707  if (!pet->IsAlive())
4708  return;
4709 
4710  int32 benefit = pet->GetCurrentFoodBenefitLevel(foodItem->GetTemplate()->ItemLevel);
4711  if (benefit <= 0)
4712  return;
4713 
4714  ExecuteLogEffectDestroyItem(effIndex, foodItem->GetEntry());
4715 
4716  uint32 count = 1;
4717  player->DestroyItemCount(foodItem, count, true);
4718  // TODO: fix crash when a spell has two effects, both pointed at the same item target
4719 
4720  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(pet, m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell, &benefit, nullptr, nullptr, true);
4721 }
4722 
4723 void Spell::EffectDismissPet(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4724 {
4725  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4726  return;
4727 
4728  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsPet())
4729  return;
4730 
4731  Pet* pet = unitTarget->ToPet();
4732 
4733  ExecuteLogEffectUnsummonObject(effIndex, pet);
4734  pet->GetOwner()->RemovePet(pet, PET_SAVE_NOT_IN_SLOT);
4735 }
4736 
4737 void Spell::EffectSummonObject(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4738 {
4739  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4740  return;
4741 
4742  uint32 gameobjectId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
4743 
4744  uint8 slot = 0;
4745  switch (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect)
4746  {
4747  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_OBJECT_SLOT1:
4748  slot = 0;
4749  break;
4750  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_OBJECT_SLOT2:
4751  slot = 1;
4752  break;
4753  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_OBJECT_SLOT3:
4754  slot = 2;
4755  break;
4756  case SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_OBJECT_SLOT4:
4757  slot = 3;
4758  break;
4759  default:
4760  return;
4761  }
4762 
4763  if (m_caster)
4764  {
4765  ObjectGuid guid = m_caster->m_ObjectSlot[slot];
4766  if (guid)
4767  {
4768  if (GameObject* gameObject = m_caster->GetMap()->GetGameObject(guid))
4769  {
4770  // Recast case - null spell id to make auras not be removed on object remove from world
4771  if (m_spellInfo->Id == gameObject->GetSpellId())
4772  gameObject->SetSpellId(0);
4773  m_caster->RemoveGameObject(gameObject, true);
4774  }
4775  m_caster->m_ObjectSlot[slot].Clear();
4776  }
4777  }
4778 
4779  GameObject* pGameObj = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(gameobjectId) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
4780 
4781  float x, y, z;
4782  // If dest location if present
4783  if (m_targets.HasDst())
4784  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y, z);
4785  // Summon in random point all other units if location present
4786  else
4787  m_caster->GetClosePoint(x, y, z, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE);
4788 
4789  Map* map = m_caster->GetMap();
4790  if (!pGameObj->Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), gameobjectId, map, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, m_caster->GetOrientation(), G3D::Quat(), 0, GO_STATE_READY))
4791  {
4792  delete pGameObj;
4793  return;
4794  }
4795 
4796  //pGameObj->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_LEVEL, m_caster->getLevel());
4797  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
4798  pGameObj->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration / IN_MILLISECONDS : 0);
4799  pGameObj->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
4800  m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj);
4801 
4802  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, pGameObj);
4803 
4804  map->AddToMap(pGameObj, true);
4805 
4806  m_caster->m_ObjectSlot[slot] = pGameObj->GetGUID();
4807 }
4808 
4809 void Spell::EffectResurrect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4810 {
4811  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4812  return;
4813 
4814  if (!unitTarget)
4815  return;
4816 
4817  if (!unitTarget)
4818  return;
4819 
4820  Player* target = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4821  if (!target)
4822  {
4823  return;
4824  }
4825 
4826  if (unitTarget->IsAlive() || !unitTarget->IsInWorld())
4827  return;
4828 
4829  if (target->isResurrectRequested()) // already have one active request
4830  return;
4831 
4832  uint32 health = target->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage);
4833  uint32 mana = CalculatePct(target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA), damage);
4834 
4835  ExecuteLogEffectResurrect(effIndex, target);
4836 
4837  target->setResurrectRequestData(m_caster->GetGUID(), m_caster->GetMapId(), m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ(), health, mana);
4838  SendResurrectRequest(target);
4839 }
4840 
4841 void Spell::EffectAddExtraAttacks(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4842 {
4843  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4844  return;
4845 
4846  if (!unitTarget || !unitTarget->IsAlive() || !unitTarget->GetVictim())
4847  return;
4848 
4849  if (unitTarget->m_extraAttacks)
4850  return;
4851 
4852  unitTarget->m_extraAttacks = damage;
4853 
4854  ExecuteLogEffectExtraAttacks(effIndex, unitTarget->GetVictim(), damage);
4855 }
4856 
4857 void Spell::EffectParry(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4858 {
4859  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4860  return;
4861 
4862  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4863  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetCanParry(true);
4864 }
4865 
4866 void Spell::EffectBlock(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4867 {
4868  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4869  return;
4870 
4871  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4872  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetCanBlock(true);
4873 }
4874 
4875 void Spell::EffectLeap(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4876 {
4877  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4878  return;
4879 
4880  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->IsInFlight())
4881  return;
4882 
4883  if (!m_targets.HasDst())
4884  return;
4885 
4886  Position dstpos = destTarget->GetPosition();
4887  unitTarget->NearTeleportTo(dstpos.GetPositionX(), dstpos.GetPositionY(), dstpos.GetPositionZ(), dstpos.GetOrientation(), unitTarget == m_caster);
4888 }
4889 
4890 void Spell::EffectReputation(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4891 {
4892  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4893  return;
4894 
4895  if (!unitTarget)
4896  return;
4897 
4898  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4899  if (!player)
4900  {
4901  return;
4902  }
4903 
4904  int32 repChange = damage;
4905 
4906  uint32 factionId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
4907 
4908  FactionEntry const* factionEntry = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(factionId);
4909  if (!factionEntry)
4910  return;
4911 
4912  repChange = player->CalculateReputationGain(REPUTATION_SOURCE_SPELL, 0, repChange, factionId);
4913 
4914  player->GetReputationMgr().ModifyReputation(factionEntry, repChange);
4915 }
4916 
4917 void Spell::EffectQuestComplete(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
4918 {
4919  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
4920  return;
4921 
4922  if (!unitTarget)
4923  return;
4924 
4925  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
4926  if (!player)
4927  {
4928  return;
4929  }
4930 
4931  uint32 questId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
4932  if (questId)
4933  {
4934  Quest const* quest = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(questId);
4935  if (!quest)
4936  return;
4937 
4938  uint16 logSlot = player->FindQuestSlot(questId);
4939  if (logSlot < MAX_QUEST_LOG_SIZE)
4940  player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(questId);
4941  else if (player->CanTakeQuest(quest, false)) // never rewarded before
4942  player->CompleteQuest(questId); // quest not in log - for internal use
4943  }
4944 }
4945 
4946 void Spell::EffectForceDeselect(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
4947 {
4948  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
4949  return;
4950 
4951  // xinef: clear focus
4952  m_caster->SendClearTarget();
4953 
4954  WorldPacket data(SMSG_CLEAR_TARGET, 8);
4955  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
4956 
4957  float dist = m_caster->GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION;
