4958  Acore::MessageDistDelivererToHostile notifier(m_caster, &data, dist);
4959  Cell::VisitWorldObjects(m_caster, notifier, dist);
4960 
4961  // xinef: we should also force pets to remove us from current target
4962  Unit::AttackerSet attackerSet;
4963  for (Unit::AttackerSet::const_iterator itr = m_caster->getAttackers().begin(); itr != m_caster->getAttackers().end(); ++itr)
4964  if ((*itr)->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !(*itr)->CanHaveThreatList())
4965  attackerSet.insert(*itr);
4966 
4967  for (Unit::AttackerSet::const_iterator itr = attackerSet.begin(); itr != attackerSet.end(); ++itr)
4968  (*itr)->AttackStop();
4969 
4970  // Xinef: Mirror images code Initialize Images
4971  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 58836)
4972  {
4973  std::vector<Unit*> images;
4974  for (Unit::ControlSet::const_iterator itr = m_caster->m_Controlled.begin(); itr != m_caster->m_Controlled.end(); ++itr)
4975  if ((*itr)->GetEntry() == 31216 /*NPC_MIRROR_IMAGE*/)
4976  images.push_back(*itr);
4977 
4978  if (images.empty())
4979  return;
4980 
4981  UnitList targets;
4982  Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(m_caster, m_caster, m_caster->GetVisibilityRange()); // no VISIBILITY_COMPENSATION, distance is enough
4983  Acore::UnitListSearcher<Acore::AnyUnfriendlyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(m_caster, targets, u_check);
4984  Cell::VisitAllObjects(m_caster, searcher, m_caster->GetVisibilityRange());
4985  for (UnitList::iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
4986  {
4987  if (!(*iter)->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_CASTING))
4988  continue;
4989 
4990  if (Spell* spell = (*iter)->GetCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL))
4991  {
4992  if (spell->m_targets.GetUnitTargetGUID() == m_caster->GetGUID())
4993  {
4994  const SpellInfo* si = spell->GetSpellInfo();
4995  if (si->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT) && (*iter)->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4996  {
4997  Creature* c = (*iter)->ToCreature();
4998  if ((!c->IsPet() && c->GetCreatureTemplate()->rank == CREATURE_ELITE_WORLDBOSS) || c->isWorldBoss() || c->IsDungeonBoss())
4999  continue;
5000  }
5001 
5002  bool interrupt = false; // pussywizard: skip spells that don't target units, but casted on unit (eg. TARGET_DEST_TARGET_ENEMY)
5003  for (uint8 j = 0; j < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++j)
5004  if (si->Effects[j].Effect && (si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT || si->Effects[j].GetUsedTargetObjectType() == TARGET_OBJECT_TYPE_UNIT_AND_DEST))
5005  {
5006  // at least one effect truly targets an unit, interrupt the spell
5007  interrupt = true;
5008  break;
5009  }
5010 
5011  if (interrupt)
5012  spell->m_targets.SetUnitTarget(images.at(urand(0, images.size() - 1)));
5013  }
5014  }
5015  }
5016  }
5017 }
5018 
5019 void Spell::EffectSelfResurrect(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5020 {
5021  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
5022  return;
5023 
5024  if (!m_caster || m_caster->IsAlive())
5025  return;
5026  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5027  return;
5028  if (!m_caster->IsInWorld())
5029  return;
5030 
5031  uint32 health = 0;
5032  uint32 mana = 0;
5033 
5034  // flat case
5035  if (damage < 0)
5036  {
5037  health = uint32(-damage);
5038  mana = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5039  }
5040  // percent case
5041  else
5042  {
5043  health = m_caster->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage);
5044  if (m_caster->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) > 0)
5045  mana = CalculatePct(m_caster->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA), damage);
5046  }
5047 
5048  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5049  player->ResurrectPlayer(0.0f);
5050 
5051  player->SetHealth(health);
5052  player->SetPower(POWER_MANA, mana);
5053  player->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, 0);
5054  player->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, player->GetMaxPower(POWER_ENERGY));
5055 
5056  player->SpawnCorpseBones();
5057 }
5058 
5059 void Spell::EffectSkinning(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5060 {
5061  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5062  return;
5063 
5064  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
5065  return;
5066  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5067  return;
5068 
5069  Creature* creature = unitTarget->ToCreature();
5070  int32 targetLevel = creature->getLevel();
5071 
5072  uint32 skill = creature->GetCreatureTemplate()->GetRequiredLootSkill();
5073 
5074  creature->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE);
5075  creature->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_LOOTABLE);
5076  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendLoot(creature->GetGUID(), LOOT_SKINNING);
5077 
5078  int32 reqValue = targetLevel < 10 ? 0 : targetLevel < 20 ? (targetLevel - 10) * 10 : targetLevel * 5;
5079 
5080  int32 skillValue = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetPureSkillValue(skill);
5081 
5082  // Double chances for elites
5083  m_caster->ToPlayer()->UpdateGatherSkill(skill, skillValue, reqValue, creature->isElite() ? 2 : 1);
5084 }
5085 
5086 void Spell::EffectCharge(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5087 {
5088  if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
5089  {
5090  if (!unitTarget)
5091  return;
5092 
5093  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5094  {
5095  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetSkipOnePacketForASH(m_caster->ToPlayer(), true);
5096  }
5097 
5098  // charge changes fall time
5099  if( m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER )
5100  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetFallInformation(time(nullptr), m_caster->GetPositionZ());
5101 
5102  ObjectGuid targetGUID = ObjectGuid::Empty;
5103  if (!m_spellInfo->IsPositive() && m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_caster->GetTarget() == unitTarget->GetGUID())
5104  {
5105  targetGUID = unitTarget->GetGUID();
5106  }
5107 
5108  if (m_pathFinder)
5109  {
5110  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveCharge(m_pathFinder->GetEndPosition().x, m_pathFinder->GetEndPosition().y, m_pathFinder->GetEndPosition().z,
5111  42.0f, EVENT_CHARGE, &m_pathFinder->GetPath(), false, 0.f, targetGUID);
5112 
5113  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5114  {
5115  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5116  }
5117  }
5118  else
5119  {
5120  Position pos = unitTarget->GetFirstCollisionPosition(unitTarget->GetObjectSize(), unitTarget->GetRelativeAngle(m_caster));
5121 
5122  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveCharge(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ + Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, SPEED_CHARGE, EVENT_CHARGE,
5123  nullptr, false, 0.f, targetGUID);
5124 
5125  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5126  {
5127  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5128  }
5129  }
5130  }
5131 
5132  if (effectHandleMode == SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET && m_caster->ToPlayer())
5133  {
5134  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetSkipOnePacketForASH(m_caster->ToPlayer(), true);
5135  }
5136 }
5137 
5138 void Spell::EffectChargeDest(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5139 {
5140  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH)
5141  return;
5142 
5143  if (m_caster->ToPlayer())
5144  {
5145  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetSkipOnePacketForASH(m_caster->ToPlayer(), true);
5146  }
5147 
5148  if (m_targets.HasDst())
5149  {
5150  Position pos = destTarget->GetPosition();
5151 
5152  if (!m_caster->IsWithinLOS(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY(), pos.GetPositionZ()))
5153  {
5154  float angle = m_caster->GetRelativeAngle(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY());
5155  float dist = m_caster->GetDistance(pos);
5156  pos = m_caster->GetFirstCollisionPosition(dist, angle);
5157  }
5158 
5159  m_caster->GetMotionMaster()->MoveCharge(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
5160 
5161  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5162  {
5163  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5164  }
5165  }
5166 }
5167 
5168 void Spell::EffectKnockBack(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5169 {
5170  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5171  return;
5172 
5173  if (!unitTarget)
5174  return;
5175 
5176  // Xinef: allow entry specific spells to skip those checks
5177  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetA.GetCheckType() != TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY && m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TargetB.GetCheckType() != TARGET_CHECK_ENTRY)
5178  {
5179  if (unitTarget->IsVehicle() && unitTarget->GetCreatureType() != CREATURE_TYPE_BEAST)
5180  return;
5181 
5182  if (unitTarget->GetVehicle())
5183  return;
5184 
5185  if (Creature* creatureTarget = unitTarget->ToCreature())
5186  if (creatureTarget->isWorldBoss() || creatureTarget->IsDungeonBoss() || creatureTarget->IsImmuneToKnockback() || unitTarget->ToCreature()->GetCreatureType() == CREATURE_TYPE_GIANT)
5187  return;
5188  }
5189 
5190  // Spells with SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK(like Thunderstorm) can't knoback target if target has ROOT
5191  if (unitTarget->HasUnitState(UNIT_STATE_ROOT))
5192  return;
5193 
5194  // Instantly interrupt non melee spells being casted
5195  if (unitTarget->IsNonMeleeSpellCast(true))
5196  unitTarget->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
5197 
5198  float ratio = 0.1f;
5199  float speedxy = float(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue) * ratio;
5200  float speedz = float(damage) * ratio;
5201  if (speedxy <= 0.1f && speedz <= 0.1f)
5202  return;
5203 
5204  float x, y;
5205  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK_DEST)
5206  {
5207  if (m_targets.HasDst())
5208  destTarget->GetPosition(x, y);
5209  else
5210  return;
5211  }
5212  else //if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_KNOCK_BACK)
5213  {
5214  m_caster->GetPosition(x, y);
5215  }
5216 
5217  unitTarget->KnockbackFrom(x, y, speedxy, speedz);
5218 
5219  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5220  {
5221  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(unitTarget->ToPlayer());
5222  }
5223 }
5224 
5225 void Spell::EffectLeapBack(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5226 {
5227  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH_TARGET)
5228  return;
5229 
5230  if (!unitTarget)
5231  return;
5232 
5233  float speedxy = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue / 10.0f;
5234  float speedz = damage / 10.0f;
5235  //1891: Disengage
5236  m_caster->JumpTo(speedxy, speedz, m_spellInfo->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER);
5237 
5238  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5239  {
5240  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5241  }
5242 
5243  // xinef: changes fall time
5244  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5245  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetFallInformation(time(nullptr), m_caster->GetPositionZ());
5246 }
5247 
5248 void Spell::EffectQuestClear(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5249 {
5250  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5251  return;
5252 
5253  if (!unitTarget)
5254  return;
5255 
5256  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5257  if (!player)
5258  {
5259  return;
5260  }
5261 
5262  uint32 quest_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5263 
5264  Quest const* quest = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(quest_id);
5265 
5266  if (!quest)
5267  return;
5268 
5269  // Player has never done this quest
5270  if (player->GetQuestStatus(quest_id) == QUEST_STATUS_NONE)
5271  return;
5272 
5273  // remove all quest entries for 'entry' from quest log
5274  for (uint8 slot = 0; slot < MAX_QUEST_LOG_SIZE; ++slot)
5275  {
5276  uint32 logQuest = player->GetQuestSlotQuestId(slot);
5277  if (logQuest == quest_id)
5278  {
5279  player->SetQuestSlot(slot, 0);
5280 
5281  // we ignore unequippable quest items in this case, it's still be equipped
5282  player->TakeQuestSourceItem(logQuest, false);
5283 
5284  if (quest->HasFlag(QUEST_FLAGS_FLAGS_PVP))
5285  {
5286  player->pvpInfo.IsHostile = player->pvpInfo.IsInHostileArea || player->HasPvPForcingQuest();
5287  player->UpdatePvPState();
5288  }
5289  }
5290  }
5291 
5292  player->RemoveRewardedQuest(quest_id);
5293  player->RemoveActiveQuest(quest_id, false);
5294 }
5295 
5296 void Spell::EffectSendTaxi(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5297 {
5298  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5299  return;
5300 
5301  if (!unitTarget)
5302  return;
5303 
5304  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5305  if (!player)
5306  {
5307  return;
5308  }
5309 
5310  player->ActivateTaxiPathTo(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue, m_spellInfo->Id);
5311 }
5312 
5313 void Spell::EffectPullTowards(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5314 {
5315  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5316  return;
5317 
5318  if (!unitTarget)
5319  return;
5320 
5321  Position pos;
5322  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PULL_TOWARDS_DEST)
5323  {
5324  if (m_targets.HasDst())
5325  pos.Relocate(*destTarget);
5326  else
5327  return;
5328  }
5329  else //if (m_spellInfo->Effects[i].Effect == SPELL_EFFECT_PULL_TOWARDS)
5330  {
5331  // Xinef: Increase Z position a little bit, should protect from falling through textures
5332  pos.Relocate(m_caster->GetPositionX(), m_caster->GetPositionY(), m_caster->GetPositionZ() + 1.0f, m_caster->GetOrientation());
5333  }
5334 
5335  float speedXY = float(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue) * 0.1f;
5336  float speedZ = unitTarget->GetDistance(pos) / speedXY * 0.5f * Movement::gravity;
5337 
5338  unitTarget->GetMotionMaster()->MoveJump(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY(), pos.GetPositionZ(), speedXY, speedZ);
5339 
5340  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5341  {
5342  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetSkipOnePacketForASH(unitTarget->ToPlayer(), true);
5343  sScriptMgr->AnticheatSetUnderACKmount(unitTarget->ToPlayer());
5344  }
5345 }
5346 
5347 void Spell::EffectDispelMechanic(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5348 {
5349  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5350  return;
5351 
5352  if (!unitTarget)
5353  return;
5354 
5355  uint32 mechanic = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5356 
5357  std::queue<std::pair<uint32, ObjectGuid>> dispel_list;
5358 
5359  Unit::AuraMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetOwnedAuras();
5360  for (Unit::AuraMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
5361  {
5362  Aura* aura = itr->second;
5363  if (!aura->GetApplicationOfTarget(unitTarget->GetGUID()))
5364  continue;
5365  if (roll_chance_i(aura->CalcDispelChance(unitTarget, !unitTarget->IsFriendlyTo(m_caster))))
5366  {
5367  if ((aura->GetSpellInfo()->GetAllEffectsMechanicMask() & (1 << mechanic)))
5368  {
5369  dispel_list.push(std::make_pair(aura->GetId(), aura->GetCasterGUID()));
5370 
5371  // spell only removes 1 bleed effect do not continue
5372  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].BasePoints == 1)
5373  {
5374  break;
5375  }
5376  }
5377  }
5378  }
5379 
5380  for (; dispel_list.size(); dispel_list.pop())
5381  {
5382  unitTarget->RemoveAura(dispel_list.front().first, dispel_list.front().second, 0, AURA_REMOVE_BY_ENEMY_SPELL);
5383  }
5384 
5385  // put in combat
5386  if (unitTarget->IsFriendlyTo(m_caster))
5387  unitTarget->getHostileRefMgr().threatAssist(m_caster, 0.0f, m_spellInfo);
5388 }
5389 
5390 void Spell::EffectResurrectPet(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5391 {
5392  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
5393  return;
5394 
5395  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5396  if (!player)
5397  return;
5398 
5399  Pet* pet = player->GetPet();
5400  if (pet && pet->IsAlive())
5401  return;
5402 
5403  if (damage < 0)
5404  return;
5405 
5406  float x, y, z;
5407  player->GetPosition(x, y, z);
5408  if (!pet)
5409  {
5410  player->SummonPet(0, x, y, z, player->GetOrientation(), SUMMON_PET, 0, 0, ObjectGuid((uint64)damage), PET_LOAD_SUMMON_DEAD_PET);
5411  return;
5412  }
5413 
5414  pet->SetPosition(x, y, z, player->GetOrientation());
5415 
5416  pet->SetUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_NONE);
5417  pet->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SKINNABLE);
5418  pet->setDeathState(ALIVE);
5419  pet->ClearUnitState(uint32(UNIT_STATE_ALL_STATE & ~(UNIT_STATE_POSSESSED))); // xinef: just in case
5420  pet->SetHealth(pet->CountPctFromMaxHealth(damage));
5421 
5422  // xinef: restore movement
5423  if (pet->GetCharmInfo())
5424  {
5425  pet->GetCharmInfo()->SetIsAtStay(false);
5426  pet->GetCharmInfo()->SetIsFollowing(false);
5427  }
5428 
5429  pet->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, false);
5430 }
5431 
5432 void Spell::EffectDestroyAllTotems(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5433 {
5434  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
5435  return;
5436 
5437  int32 mana = 0;
5438  for (uint8 slot = SUMMON_SLOT_TOTEM; slot < MAX_TOTEM_SLOT; ++slot)
5439  {
5440  if (!m_caster->m_SummonSlot[slot])
5441  continue;
5442 
5443  Creature* totem = m_caster->GetMap()->GetCreature(m_caster->m_SummonSlot[slot]);
5444  if (totem && totem->IsTotem())
5445  {
5446  uint32 spell_id = totem->GetUInt32Value(UNIT_CREATED_BY_SPELL);
5447  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
5448  if (spellInfo)
5449  {
5450  mana += spellInfo->ManaCost;
5451  mana += int32(CalculatePct(m_caster->GetCreateMana(), spellInfo->ManaCostPercentage));
5452  }
5453  totem->ToTotem()->UnSummon();
5454  }
5455  }
5456  ApplyPct(mana, damage);
5457  if (mana)
5458  m_caster->CastCustomSpell(m_caster, 39104, &mana, nullptr, nullptr, true);
5459 }
5460 
5461 void Spell::EffectDurabilityDamage(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5462 {
5463  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5464  return;
5465 
5466  if (!unitTarget)
5467  return;
5468 
5469  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5470  if (!player)
5471  {
5472  return;
5473  }
5474 
5475  int32 slot = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5476 
5477  // -1 means all player equipped items and -2 all items
5478  if (slot < 0)
5479  {
5480  player->DurabilityPointsLossAll(damage, (slot < -1));
5481  ExecuteLogEffectDurabilityDamage(effIndex, unitTarget, -1, -1);
5482  return;
5483  }
5484 
5485  // invalid slot value
5486  if (slot >= INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
5487  return;
5488 
5489  if (Item* item = player->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, slot))
5490  {
5491  player->DurabilityPointsLoss(item, damage);
5492  ExecuteLogEffectDurabilityDamage(effIndex, unitTarget, item->GetEntry(), slot);
5493  }
5494 }
5495 
5496 void Spell::EffectDurabilityDamagePCT(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5497 {
5498  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5499  return;
5500 
5501  if (!unitTarget)
5502  return;
5503 
5504  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5505  if (!player)
5506  {
5507  return;
5508  }
5509 
5510  int32 slot = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5511 
5512  // FIXME: some spells effects have value -1/-2
5513  // Possibly its mean -1 all player equipped items and -2 all items
5514  if (slot < 0)
5515  {
5516  player->DurabilityLossAll(float(damage) / 100.0f, (slot < -1));
5517  return;
5518  }
5519 
5520  // invalid slot value
5521  if (slot >= INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_END)
5522  return;
5523 
5524  if (damage <= 0)
5525  return;
5526 
5527  if (Item* item = player->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, slot))
5528  player->DurabilityLoss(item, float(damage) / 100.0f);
5529 }
5530 
5531 void Spell::EffectModifyThreatPercent(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5532 {
5533  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5534  return;
5535 
5536  if (!unitTarget)
5537  return;
5538 
5539  unitTarget->getThreatMgr().modifyThreatPercent(m_caster, damage);
5540 }
5541 
5542 void Spell::EffectTransmitted(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5543 {
5544  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
5545  return;
5546 
5547  uint32 name_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5548 
5549  GameObjectTemplate const* goinfo = sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(name_id);
5550 
5551  if (!goinfo)
5552  {
5553  LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Gameobject (Entry: %u) not exist and not created at spell (ID: %u) cast", name_id, m_spellInfo->Id);
5554  return;
5555  }
5556 
5557  float fx, fy, fz;
5558 
5559  if (m_targets.HasDst())
5560  destTarget->GetPosition(fx, fy, fz);
5561  //FIXME: this can be better check for most objects but still hack
5562  else if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].HasRadius() && m_spellInfo->Speed == 0)
5563  {
5564  float dis = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].CalcRadius(m_originalCaster);
5565  m_caster->GetClosePoint(fx, fy, fz, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE, dis);
5566  }
5567  else
5568  {
5569  //GO is always friendly to it's creator, get range for friends
5570  float min_dis = m_spellInfo->GetMinRange(true);
5571  float max_dis = m_spellInfo->GetMaxRange(true);
5572  float dis = (float)rand_norm() * (max_dis - min_dis) + min_dis;
5573 
5574  m_caster->GetClosePoint(fx, fy, fz, DEFAULT_WORLD_OBJECT_SIZE, dis);
5575  }
5576 
5577  // Seaforium charge
5578  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 52410 || m_spellInfo->Id == 66268 || m_spellInfo->Id == 66674) // SotA / IoC / IoC Huge
5579  {
5580  fx = m_caster->GetPositionX();
5581  fy = m_caster->GetPositionY();
5582  fz = m_caster->GetPositionZ();
5583  }
5584 
5585  Map* cMap = m_caster->GetMap();
5586  // if gameobject is summoning object, it should be spawned right on caster's position
5587  if (goinfo->type == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_SUMMONING_RITUAL)
5588  m_caster->GetPosition(fx, fy, fz);
5589 
5590  GameObject* pGameObj = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(name_id) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
5591 
5592  if (!pGameObj->Create(cMap->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), name_id, cMap, m_caster->GetPhaseMask(), fx, fy, fz, m_caster->GetOrientation(), G3D::Quat(), 100, GO_STATE_READY))
5593  {
5594  delete pGameObj;
5595  return;
5596  }
5597 
5598  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
5599 
5600  switch (goinfo->type)
5601  {
5602  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FISHINGNODE:
5603  {
5604  m_caster->SetGuidValue(UNIT_FIELD_CHANNEL_OBJECT, pGameObj->GetGUID());
5605  m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj); // will removed at spell cancel
5606 
5607  // end time of range when possible catch fish (FISHING_BOBBER_READY_TIME..GetDuration(m_spellInfo))
5608  // start time == fish-FISHING_BOBBER_READY_TIME (0..GetDuration(m_spellInfo)-FISHING_BOBBER_READY_TIME)
5609  int32 lastSec = 0;
5610  switch (urand(0, 2))
5611  {
5612  case 0:
5613  lastSec = 3;
5614  break;
5615  case 1:
5616  lastSec = 7;
5617  break;
5618  case 2:
5619  lastSec = 13;
5620  break;
5621  }
5622 
5623  // Duration of the fishing bobber can't be higher than the Fishing channeling duration
5624  duration = std::min(duration, duration - lastSec*IN_MILLISECONDS + FISHING_BOBBER_READY_TIME*IN_MILLISECONDS);
5625 
5626  break;
5627  }
5628  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_SUMMONING_RITUAL:
5629  {
5630  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5631  {
5632  pGameObj->AddUniqueUse(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5633  m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj); // will be removed at spell cancel
5634  }
5635  break;
5636  }
5637  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DUEL_ARBITER: // 52991
5638  m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj);
5639  break;
5640  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_FISHINGHOLE:
5641  case GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_CHEST:
5642  default:
5643  break;
5644  }
5645 
5646  pGameObj->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration / IN_MILLISECONDS : 0);
5647 
5648  pGameObj->SetOwnerGUID(m_caster->GetGUID());
5649 
5650  //pGameObj->SetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_LEVEL, m_caster->getLevel());
5651  pGameObj->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
5652 
5653  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, pGameObj);
5654 
5655  LOG_DEBUG("spells.effect", "AddObject at SpellEfects.cpp EffectTransmitted");
5656  //m_caster->AddGameObject(pGameObj);
5657  //m_ObjToDel.push_back(pGameObj);
5658 
5659  cMap->AddToMap(pGameObj, true);
5660 
5661  if (GameObject* linkedTrap = pGameObj->GetLinkedTrap())
5662  {
5663  linkedTrap->SetRespawnTime(duration > 0 ? duration / IN_MILLISECONDS : 0);
5664  linkedTrap->SetSpellId(m_spellInfo->Id);
5665  linkedTrap->SetOwnerGUID(m_caster->GetGUID());
5666 
5667  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(effIndex, linkedTrap);
5668  }
5669 }
5670 
5671 void Spell::EffectProspecting(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5672 {
5673  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5674  return;
5675 
5676  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5677  return;
5678 
5679  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5680  if (!itemTarget || !(itemTarget->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_PROSPECTABLE))
5681  return;
5682 
5683  if (itemTarget->GetCount() < 5)
5684  return;
5685 
5686  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SKILL_PROSPECTING))
5687  {
5688  uint32 SkillValue = p_caster->GetPureSkillValue(SKILL_JEWELCRAFTING);
5689  uint32 reqSkillValue = itemTarget->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
5690  p_caster->UpdateGatherSkill(SKILL_JEWELCRAFTING, SkillValue, reqSkillValue);
5691  }
5692 
5693  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendLoot(itemTarget->GetGUID(), LOOT_PROSPECTING);
5694 }
5695 
5696 void Spell::EffectMilling(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5697 {
5698  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5699  return;
5700 
5701  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5702  return;
5703 
5704  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5705  if (!itemTarget || !(itemTarget->GetTemplate()->Flags & ITEM_FLAG_IS_MILLABLE))
5706  return;
5707 
5708  if (itemTarget->GetCount() < 5)
5709  return;
5710 
5711  if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_SKILL_MILLING))
5712  {
5713  uint32 SkillValue = p_caster->GetPureSkillValue(SKILL_INSCRIPTION);
5714  uint32 reqSkillValue = itemTarget->GetTemplate()->RequiredSkillRank;
5715  p_caster->UpdateGatherSkill(SKILL_INSCRIPTION, SkillValue, reqSkillValue);
5716  }
5717 
5718  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SendLoot(itemTarget->GetGUID(), LOOT_MILLING);
5719 }
5720 
5721 void Spell::EffectSkill(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5722 {
5723  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
5724  return;
5725 
5726  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "WORLD: SkillEFFECT");
5727 }
5728 
5729 /* There is currently no need for this effect. We handle it in Battleground.cpp
5730  If we would handle the resurrection here, the spiritguide would instantly disappear as the
5731  player revives, and so we wouldn't see the spirit heal visual effect on the npc.
5732  This is why we use a half sec delay between the visual effect and the resurrection itself */
5733 void Spell::EffectSpiritHeal(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5734 {
5735  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5736  return;
5737 
5738  /*
5739  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5740  return;
5741  if (!unitTarget->IsInWorld())
5742  return;
5743 
5744  //m_spellInfo->Effects[i].BasePoints; == 99 (percent?)
5745  //unitTarget->ToPlayer()->setResurrect(m_caster->GetGUID(), unitTarget->GetPositionX(), unitTarget->GetPositionY(), unitTarget->GetPositionZ(), unitTarget->GetMaxHealth(), unitTarget->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
5746  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->ResurrectPlayer(1.0f);
5747  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->SpawnCorpseBones();
5748  */
5749 }
5750 
5751 // remove insignia spell effect
5752 void Spell::EffectSkinPlayerCorpse(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
5753 {
5754  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5755  return;
5756 
5757  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Effect: SkinPlayerCorpse");
5758  if ((m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) || (unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) || (unitTarget->IsAlive()))
5759  return;
5760 
5761  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->RemovedInsignia(m_caster->ToPlayer());
5762 }
5763 
5764 void Spell::EffectStealBeneficialBuff(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5765 {
5766  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5767  return;
5768 
5769  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "Effect: StealBeneficialBuff");
5770 
5771  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget == m_caster) // can't steal from self
5772  return;
5773 
5774  DispelChargesList steal_list;
5775 
5776  // Create dispel mask by dispel type
5777  uint32 dispelMask = SpellInfo::GetDispelMask(DispelType(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue));
5778  Unit::AuraMap const& auras = unitTarget->GetOwnedAuras();
5779  for (Unit::AuraMap::const_iterator itr = auras.begin(); itr != auras.end(); ++itr)
5780  {
5781  Aura* aura = itr->second;
5782  AuraApplication* aurApp = aura->GetApplicationOfTarget(unitTarget->GetGUID());
5783  if (!aurApp)
5784  continue;
5785 
5786  if ((aura->GetSpellInfo()->GetDispelMask()) & dispelMask)
5787  {
5788  // Need check for passive? this
5789  if (!aurApp->IsPositive() || aura->IsPassive() || aura->GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR4_CANNOT_BE_STOLEN))
5790  continue;
5791 
5792  // The charges / stack amounts don't count towards the total number of auras that can be dispelled.
5793  // Ie: A dispel on a target with 5 stacks of Winters Chill and a Polymorph has 1 / (1 + 1) -> 50% chance to dispell
5794  // Polymorph instead of 1 / (5 + 1) -> 16%.
5795  bool dispel_charges = aura->GetSpellInfo()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_DISPEL_REMOVES_CHARGES);
5796  uint8 charges = dispel_charges ? aura->GetCharges() : aura->GetStackAmount();
5797  if (charges > 0)
5798  steal_list.push_back(std::make_pair(aura, charges));
5799  }
5800  }
5801 
5802  if (steal_list.empty())
5803  return;
5804 
5805  // Ok if exist some buffs for dispel try dispel it
5806  uint32 failCount = 0;
5807  DispelList success_list;
5808  WorldPacket dataFail(SMSG_DISPEL_FAILED, 8 + 8 + 4 + 4 + damage * 4);
5809  // dispel N = damage buffs (or while exist buffs for dispel)
5810  for (int32 count = 0; count < damage && !steal_list.empty();)
5811  {
5812  // Random select buff for dispel
5813  DispelChargesList::iterator itr = steal_list.begin();
5814  std::advance(itr, urand(0, steal_list.size() - 1));
5815 
5816  int32 chance = itr->first->CalcDispelChance(unitTarget, !unitTarget->IsFriendlyTo(m_caster));
5817  // 2.4.3 Patch Notes: "Dispel effects will no longer attempt to remove effects that have 100% dispel resistance."
5818  if (!chance)
5819  {
5820  steal_list.erase(itr);
5821  continue;
5822  }
5823  else
5824  {
5825  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
5826  {
5827  success_list.push_back(std::make_pair(itr->first->GetId(), itr->first->GetCasterGUID()));
5828  --itr->second;
5829  if (itr->second <= 0)
5830  steal_list.erase(itr);
5831  }
5832  else
5833  {
5834  if (!failCount)
5835  {
5836  // Failed to dispell
5837  dataFail << m_caster->GetGUID(); // Caster GUID
5838  dataFail << unitTarget->GetGUID(); // Victim GUID
5839  dataFail << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // dispel spell id
5840  }
5841  ++failCount;
5842  dataFail << uint32(itr->first->GetId()); // Spell Id
5843  }
5844  ++count;
5845  }
5846  }
5847 
5848  if (failCount)
5849  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&dataFail, true);
5850 
5851  if (success_list.empty())
5852  return;
5853 
5854  WorldPacket dataSuccess(SMSG_SPELLSTEALLOG, 8 + 8 + 4 + 1 + 4 + damage * 5);
5855  dataSuccess << unitTarget->GetPackGUID(); // Victim GUID
5856  dataSuccess << m_caster->GetPackGUID(); // Caster GUID
5857  dataSuccess << uint32(m_spellInfo->Id); // dispel spell id
5858  dataSuccess << uint8(0); // not used
5859  dataSuccess << uint32(success_list.size()); // count
5860  for (DispelList::iterator itr = success_list.begin(); itr != success_list.end(); ++itr)
5861  {
5862  dataSuccess << uint32(itr->first); // Spell Id
5863  dataSuccess << uint8(0); // 0 - steals !=0 transfers
5864  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpellBySteal(itr->first, itr->second, m_caster);
5865  }
5866  m_caster->SendMessageToSet(&dataSuccess, true);
5867 }
5868 
5869 void Spell::EffectKillCreditPersonal(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5870 {
5871  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5872  return;
5873 
5874  if (!unitTarget)
5875  return;
5876 
5877  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5878  if (!player)
5879  {
5880  return;
5881  }
5882 
5883  player->KilledMonsterCredit(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue);
5884 }
5885 
5886 void Spell::EffectKillCredit(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5887 {
5888  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5889  return;
5890 
5891  if (!unitTarget)
5892  return;
5893 
5894  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5895  if (!player)
5896  {
5897  return;
5898  }
5899 
5900  int32 creatureEntry = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
5901  if (!creatureEntry)
5902  {
5903  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 42793) // Burn Body
5904  creatureEntry = 24008; // Fallen Combatant
5905  }
5906 
5907  if (creatureEntry)
5908  player->RewardPlayerAndGroupAtEvent(creatureEntry, unitTarget);
5909 }

5914  return;
5915 
5916  if (!unitTarget)
5917  return;
5918 
5919  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5920  if (!player)
5921  {
5922  return;
5923  }
5924

5926 }
5927 
5928 void Spell::EffectQuestStart(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5929 {
5930  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
5931  return;
5932 
5933  if (!unitTarget)
5934  return;
5935 
5936  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
5937  if (!player)
5938  return;
5939 
5940  if (Quest const* quest = sObjectMgr->GetQuestTemplate(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue))
5941  {
5942  if (!player->CanTakeQuest(quest, false))
5943  return;
5944 
5945  if (quest->IsAutoAccept() && player->CanAddQuest(quest, false))
5946  player->AddQuestAndCheckCompletion(quest, player);
5947 
5948  player->PlayerTalkClass->SendQuestGiverQuestDetails(quest, player->GetGUID(), true);
5949  }
5950 }
5951 
5952 void Spell::EffectActivateRune(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
5953 {
5954  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_LAUNCH)
5955  return;
5956 
5957  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5958  return;
5959 
5960  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
5961 
5962  if (player->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
5963  return;
5964 
5965  // needed later
5966  m_runesState = m_caster->ToPlayer()->GetRunesState();
5967 
5968  uint32 count = damage;
5969  if (count == 0) count = 1;
5970  for (uint32 j = 0; j < MAX_RUNES && count > 0; ++j)
5971  {
5972  if (player->GetRuneCooldown(j) && player->GetCurrentRune(j) == RuneType(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue))
5973  {
5974  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45529)
5975  if (player->GetBaseRune(j) != RuneType(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB))
5976  continue;
5977  player->SetRuneCooldown(j, 0);
5978  player->SetGracePeriod(j, player->IsInCombat()); // xinef: reset grace period
5979  --count;
5980  }
5981  }
5982 
5983  // Blood Tap
5984  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 45529 && count > 0)
5985  {
5986  for (uint32 l = 0; l < MAX_RUNES && count > 0; ++l)
5987  {
5988  // Check if both runes are on cd as that is the only time when this needs to come into effect
5989  if ((player->GetRuneCooldown(l) && player->GetCurrentRune(l) == RuneType(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB)) && (player->GetRuneCooldown(l + 1) && player->GetCurrentRune(l + 1) == RuneType(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB)))
5990  {
5991  // Should always update the rune with the lowest cd
5992  if (player->GetRuneCooldown(l) >= player->GetRuneCooldown(l + 1))
5993  l++;
5994  player->SetRuneCooldown(l, 0);
5995  player->SetGracePeriod(l, player->IsInCombat()); // xinef: reset grace period
5996  --count;
5997  }
5998  else
5999  break;
6000  }
6001  }
6002 
6003  // Empower rune weapon
6004  if (m_spellInfo->Id == 47568)
6005  {
6006  // Need to do this just once
6007  if (effIndex != 0)
6008  return;
6009 
6010  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
6011  {
6012  if (player->GetRuneCooldown(i) && (player->GetCurrentRune(i) == RUNE_FROST || player->GetCurrentRune(i) == RUNE_DEATH))
6013  {
6014  player->SetRuneCooldown(i, 0);
6015  player->SetGracePeriod(i, player->IsInCombat()); // xinef: reset grace period
6016  }
6017  }
6018  }
6019 
6020  // is needed to push through to the client that the rune is active
6021  //player->ResyncRunes(MAX_RUNES);
6022  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, 47804, true);
6023 }
6024 
6025 void Spell::EffectCreateTamedPet(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6026 {
6027  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6028  return;
6029 
6030  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || unitTarget->GetPetGUID() || unitTarget->getClass() != CLASS_HUNTER)
6031  return;
6032 
6033  uint32 creatureEntry = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
6034  Pet* pet = unitTarget->CreateTamedPetFrom(creatureEntry, m_spellInfo->Id);
6035  if (!pet)
6036  return;
6037 
6038  // add to world
6039  pet->GetMap()->AddToMap(pet->ToCreature(), true);
6040 
6041  // unitTarget has pet now
6042  unitTarget->SetMinion(pet, true);
6043 
6044  pet->InitTalentForLevel();
6045 
6046  if (unitTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6047  {
6048  pet->SavePetToDB(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT, false);
6049  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->PetSpellInitialize();
6050  }
6051 }
6052 
6053 void Spell::EffectDiscoverTaxi(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6054 {
6055  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6056  return;
6057 
6058  if (!unitTarget)
6059  return;
6060 
6061  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6062  if (!player)
6063  {
6064  return;
6065  }
6066 
6067  uint32 nodeid = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
6068  if (sTaxiNodesStore.LookupEntry(nodeid))
6069  player->GetSession()->SendDiscoverNewTaxiNode(nodeid);
6070 }
6071 
6072 void Spell::EffectTitanGrip(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6073 {
6074  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
6075  return;
6076 
6077  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6078  {
6079  if (Aura* aur = m_caster->GetAura(49152))
6080  aur->RecalculateAmountOfEffects();
6081  else
6082  m_caster->CastSpell(unitTarget, 49152, true); // damage reduction
6083 
6084  m_caster->ToPlayer()->SetCanTitanGrip(true);
6085  }
6086 }
6087 
6088 void Spell::EffectRedirectThreat(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)

6091  return;
6092 
6093  if (unitTarget)
6094  m_caster->SetRedirectThreat(unitTarget->GetGUID(), uint32(damage));
6095 }
6096 
6097 void Spell::EffectGameObjectDamage(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6098 {
6099  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6100  return;
6101 
6102  if (!gameObjTarget)
6103  return;
6104 
6105  Unit* caster = m_originalCaster;
6106  if (!caster)
6107  return;
6108 
6109  FactionTemplateEntry const* casterFaction = caster->GetFactionTemplateEntry();
6110  FactionTemplateEntry const* targetFaction = sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(gameObjTarget->GetUInt32Value(GAMEOBJECT_FACTION));
6111  // Do not allow to damage GO's of friendly factions (ie: Wintergrasp Walls/Ulduar Storm Beacons)
6112  if ((casterFaction && targetFaction && !casterFaction->IsFriendlyTo(*targetFaction)) || !targetFaction)
6113  gameObjTarget->ModifyHealth(-damage, caster, GetSpellInfo()->Id);
6114 }
6115 
6116 void Spell::EffectGameObjectRepair(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6117 {

6119  return;
6120 
6121  if (!gameObjTarget)
6122  return;
6123 
6124  gameObjTarget->ModifyHealth(damage, m_caster);
6125 }
6126 
6127 void Spell::EffectGameObjectSetDestructionState(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6128 {
6129  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6130  return;
6131 
6132  if (!gameObjTarget || !m_originalCaster)
6133  return;
6134 
6135  Player* player = m_originalCaster->GetCharmerOrOwnerPlayerOrPlayerItself();
6136  gameObjTarget->SetDestructibleState(GameObjectDestructibleState(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue), player, true);
6137 }
6138 
6139 void Spell::SummonGuardian(uint32 i, uint32 entry, SummonPropertiesEntry const* properties, uint32 numGuardians)
6140 {
6141  Unit* caster = m_originalCaster;
6142  if (!caster)
6143  return;
6144 
6145  if (caster->IsTotem())
6146  caster = caster->ToTotem()->GetOwner();
6147 
6148  // in another case summon new
6149  uint8 summonLevel = caster->getLevel();
6150 
6151  // level of pet summoned using engineering item based at engineering skill level
6152  if (m_CastItem && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6153  if (ItemTemplate const* proto = m_CastItem->GetTemplate())
6154  {
6155  // xinef: few special cases
6156  if (proto->RequiredSkill == SKILL_ENGINEERING)
6157  {
6158  if (uint16 skill202 = caster->ToPlayer()->GetSkillValue(SKILL_ENGINEERING))
6159  summonLevel = skill202 / 5;
6160  }
6161 
6162  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
6163  {
6164  // Dragon's Call
6165  case 13049:
6166  summonLevel = 55;
6167  break;
6168  }
6169  }
6170 
6171  summonLevel = std::min<uint8>(sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL) + sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_WORLD_BOSS_LEVEL_DIFF), std::max<uint8>(1U, summonLevel));
6172 
6173  float radius = 5.0f;
6174  int32 duration = m_spellInfo->GetDuration();
6175 
6176  if (Player* modOwner = m_originalCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
6177  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(m_spellInfo->Id, SPELLMOD_DURATION, duration);
6178 
6179  //TempSummonType summonType = (duration == 0) ? TEMPSUMMON_DEAD_DESPAWN : TEMPSUMMON_TIMED_DESPAWN;
6180  Map* map = caster->GetMap();
6181  TempSummon* summon = nullptr;
6182 
6183  uint32 currMinionsCount = m_caster->m_Controlled.size();
6184  uint32 totalNumGuardians = numGuardians + currMinionsCount;
6185 
6186  for (uint32 count = 0; count < numGuardians; ++count)
6187  {
6188  Position pos;
6189 
6190  // xinef: do not use precalculated position for effect summon pet in this function
6191  // it means it was cast by NPC and should have its position overridden
6192  if (totalNumGuardians == 1 && GetSpellInfo()->Effects[i].Effect != SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON_PET)
6193  {
6194  pos = *destTarget;
6195  }
6196  else
6197  {
6198  // randomize position
6199  pos = m_caster->GetRandomPoint(*destTarget, radius);
6200  }
6201 
6202  summon = map->SummonCreature(entry, pos, properties, duration, caster, m_spellInfo->Id);
6203  if (!summon)
6204  return;
6205 
6206  // xinef: set calculated level
6207  summon->SetLevel(summonLevel);
6208 
6209  // xinef: if we have more than one guardian, change follow angle
6210  if (summon->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_MINION) && totalNumGuardians > 1)
6211  ((Minion*)summon)->SetFollowAngle(m_caster->GetAbsoluteAngle(pos.GetPositionX(), pos.GetPositionY()));
6212  //else if (summon->HasUnitTypeMask(UNIT_MASK_MINION) && m_targets.HasDst())
6213  // ((Minion*)summon)->SetFollowAngle(m_caster->GetAngle(summon));
6214 
6215  // xinef: move this here, some auras are added in initstatsforlevel!
6216  if (!summon->IsInCombat() && !summon->IsTrigger())
6217  {
6218  // summon->AI()->EnterEvadeMode();
6219  summon->GetMotionMaster()->Clear(false);
6220  summon->GetMotionMaster()->MoveFollow(caster, PET_FOLLOW_DIST, summon->GetFollowAngle(), MOTION_SLOT_ACTIVE);
6221  }
6222 
6223  if (properties && properties->Category == SUMMON_CATEGORY_ALLY)
6224  summon->SetFaction(caster->GetFaction());
6225 
6226  ExecuteLogEffectSummonObject(i, summon);
6227  }
6228 
6229  // Summon infernal, cast enslave demon
6230  // xinef: have to do it here because in Pet init stats infernal is not in world, imo this should be changed...
6231  if (summon)
6232  {
6233  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
6234  {
6235  // Inferno, Warlock summon spell
6236  case 1122:
6237  caster->AddAura(61191, summon);
6238  break;
6239  // Ritual of Doom, Warlock summon spell
6240  case 60478:
6241  caster->AddAura(SPELL_RITUAL_ENSLAVEMENT, summon);
6242  break;
6243  }
6244  }
6245 }
6246 
6247 void Spell::EffectRenamePet(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6248 {
6249  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6250  return;
6251 
6252  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT ||
6253  !unitTarget->IsPet() || unitTarget->ToPet()->getPetType() != HUNTER_PET)
6254  return;
6255 
6256  unitTarget->SetByteFlag(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_2, 2, UNIT_CAN_BE_RENAMED);
6257 }
6258 
6259 void Spell::EffectPlayMusic(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6260 {
6261  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6262  return;
6263 
6264  if (!unitTarget)
6265  return;
6266 
6267  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6268  if (!player)
6269  {
6270  return;
6271  }
6272 
6273  uint32 soundid = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
6274 
6275  if (!sSoundEntriesStore.LookupEntry(soundid))
6276  {
6277  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "EffectPlayMusic: Sound (Id: %u) not exist in spell %u.", soundid, m_spellInfo->Id);
6278  return;
6279  }
6280 
6281  WorldPacket data(SMSG_PLAY_MUSIC, 4);
6282  data << uint32(soundid);
6283  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
6284 }
6285 
6286 void Spell::EffectSpecCount(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6287 {
6288  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6289  return;
6290 
6291  if (!unitTarget)
6292  return;
6293 
6294  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6295  if (!player)
6296  {
6297  return;
6298  }
6299 
6300  player->UpdateSpecCount(damage);
6301 }
6302 
6303 void Spell::EffectActivateSpec(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6304 {
6305  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6306  return;
6307 
6308  if (!unitTarget)
6309  return;
6310 
6311  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6312  if (!player)
6313  {
6314  return;
6315  }
6316 
6317  player->ActivateSpec(damage - 1); // damage is 1 or 2, spec is 0 or 1
6318 }
6319 
6320 void Spell::EffectPlaySound(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6321 {
6322  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6323  return;
6324 
6325  if (!unitTarget)
6326  return;
6327 
6328  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6329  if (!player)
6330  {
6331  return;
6332  }
6333 
6334  switch (m_spellInfo->Id)
6335  {
6336  case 58730: // Restricted Flight Area
6337  case 58600: // Restricted Flight Area
6338  player->GetSession()->SendNotification(LANG_ZONE_NOFLYZONE);
6339  break;
6340  default:
6341  break;
6342  }
6343 
6344  uint32 soundId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
6345 
6346  if (!sSoundEntriesStore.LookupEntry(soundId))
6347  {
6348  LOG_ERROR("spells.effect", "EffectPlayerSound: Sound (Id: %u) not exist in spell %u.", soundId, m_spellInfo->Id);
6349  return;
6350  }
6351 
6352  player->PlayDirectSound(soundId, player);
6353 }
6354 
6355 void Spell::EffectRemoveAura(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6356 {
6357  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6358  return;
6359 
6360  if (!unitTarget)
6361  return;
6362  // there may be need of specifying casterguid of removed auras
6363  unitTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].TriggerSpell);
6364 }
6365 
6366 void Spell::EffectCastButtons(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6367 {
6368  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT)
6369  return;
6370 
6371  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6372  return;
6373 
6374  Player* p_caster = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6375  uint32 button_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue + 132;
6376  uint32 n_buttons = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValueB;
6377 
6378  for (; n_buttons; --n_buttons, ++button_id)
6379  {
6380  ActionButton const* ab = p_caster->GetActionButton(button_id);
6381  if (!ab || ab->GetType() != ACTION_BUTTON_SPELL)
6382  continue;
6383 
6386  uint32 spell_id = ab->GetAction();
6387  if (!spell_id)
6388  continue;
6389 
6390  SpellInfo const* spellInfo = sSpellMgr->GetSpellInfo(spell_id);
6391  if (!spellInfo)
6392  continue;
6393 
6394  if (!p_caster->HasSpell(spell_id) || p_caster->HasSpellCooldown(spell_id))
6395  continue;
6396 
6397  if (!spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR7_CAN_BE_MULTI_CAST))
6398  continue;
6399 
6400  uint32 cost = spellInfo->CalcPowerCost(m_caster, spellInfo->GetSchoolMask(), this);
6401  if (m_caster->GetPower(POWER_MANA) < cost)
6402  continue;
6403 
6404  TriggerCastFlags triggerFlags = TriggerCastFlags(TRIGGERED_IGNORE_GCD | TRIGGERED_IGNORE_CAST_IN_PROGRESS | TRIGGERED_CAST_DIRECTLY);
6405  m_caster->CastSpell(m_caster, spell_id, triggerFlags);
6406  }
6407 }
6408 
6409 void Spell::EffectRechargeManaGem(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6410 {
6411  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6412  return;
6413 
6414  if (!unitTarget || unitTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6415  return;
6416 
6417  Player* player = m_caster->ToPlayer();
6418 
6419  if (!player)
6420  return;
6421 
6422  uint32 item_id = m_spellInfo->Effects[EFFECT_0].ItemType;
6423 
6424  ItemTemplate const* pProto = sObjectMgr->GetItemTemplate(item_id);
6425  if (!pProto)
6426  {
6427  player->SendEquipError(EQUIP_ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, nullptr, nullptr);
6428  return;
6429  }
6430 
6431  if (Item* pItem = player->GetItemByEntry(item_id))
6432  {
6433  for (int x = 0; x < MAX_ITEM_PROTO_SPELLS; ++x)
6434  pItem->SetSpellCharges(x, pProto->Spells[x].SpellCharges);
6435  pItem->SetState(ITEM_CHANGED, player);
6436  }
6437 }
6438 
6439 void Spell::EffectBind(SpellEffIndex effIndex)
6440 {
6441  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6442  return;
6443 
6444  if (!unitTarget)
6445  return;
6446 
6447  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6448  if (!player)
6449  {
6450  return;
6451  }
6452 
6453  WorldLocation homeLoc;
6454  uint32 areaId = player->GetAreaId();
6455 
6456  if (m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue)
6457  areaId = m_spellInfo->Effects[effIndex].MiscValue;
6458 
6459  if (m_targets.HasDst())
6460  homeLoc.WorldRelocate(*destTarget);
6461  else
6462  {
6463  homeLoc = player->GetWorldLocation();
6464  }
6465 
6466  player->SetHomebind(homeLoc, areaId);
6467 
6468  // binding
6469  WorldPacket data(SMSG_BINDPOINTUPDATE, 4 + 4 + 4 + 4 + 4);
6470  data << float(homeLoc.GetPositionX());
6471  data << float(homeLoc.GetPositionY());
6472  data << float(homeLoc.GetPositionZ());
6473  data << uint32(homeLoc.GetMapId());
6474  data << uint32(areaId);
6475  player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
6476 
6477  LOG_DEBUG("spells.aura", "EffectBind: New homebind X: %f, Y: %f, Z: %f, MapId: %u, AreaId: %u",
6478  homeLoc.GetPositionX(), homeLoc.GetPositionY(), homeLoc.GetPositionZ(), homeLoc.GetMapId(), areaId);
6479  // zone update
6480  data.Initialize(SMSG_PLAYERBOUND, 8 + 4);
6481  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
6482  data << uint32(areaId);
6483  player->SendDirectMessage(&data);
6484 }
6485 
6486 void Spell::EffectSummonRaFFriend(SpellEffIndex /*effIndex*/)
6487 {
6488  if (effectHandleMode != SPELL_EFFECT_HANDLE_HIT_TARGET)
6489  return;
6490 
6491  if (m_caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6492  return;
6493 
6494  if (!unitTarget)
6495  return;
6496 
6497  Player* player = unitTarget->ToPlayer();
6498  if (!player)
6499  {
6500  return;
6501  }
6502 
6503  float x, y, z;
6504  m_caster->GetPosition(x, y, z);
6505  unitTarget->ToPlayer()->SetSummonPoint(m_caster->GetMapId(), x, y, z);
6506  WorldPacket data(SMSG_SUMMON_REQUEST, 8 + 4 + 4);
6507  data << m_caster->GetGUID();
6508  data << uint32(m_caster->GetZoneId());
6509  data << uint32(MAX_PLAYER_SUMMON_DELAY * IN_MILLISECONDS); // auto decline after msecs
6510  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(&data);
6511 }
